We are committed to redefining healthcare: connecting the best of Health&Care for every provider, for every patient, for everyone. Imagine all the amazing things those two simple words can do.

Innovative Medicine
Johnson & Johnson Innovative Medicine is leading where medicine is going. Patients inform and inspire our science-based innovations, which continue to change and save lives. With rigorous science and compassion, we confidently address the most complex diseases of our time and unlock the medicines of tomorrow. Therapeutic areas include: Oncology, Immunology, Neuroscience, Cardiopulmonary and Specialty ophthalmology.
MedTech
Johnson & Johnson MedTech innovates at the intersection of biology and technology. With a focus on treating with pinpoint precision in the hardest-to-reach parts of the body, restoring anatomy and reimagining healing, our portfolio of smarter, less invasive, more personalized treatments is addressing the most complex diseases. Focus areas include: Interventional Solutions, Orthopaedics, Surgery and Vision.

This video features employees in safety gear combined with shots of our raw resources and finished paper and wood products.
Everyday products, responsibly made
At work in your world

Whether you’re at home or on the go, Georgia-Pacific provides packaging and goods to support your daily routine. Our household names include Quilted Northern® bath tissue, Brawny® paper towels, Dixie® cups and more. At public restrooms, medical facilities, restaurants and other businesses, we offer touchless dispensers and supplies for personal hygiene. We make the pulp for diapers and the corrugated boxes they arrive in on your porch, while also operating one of the largest recycling businesses. And at large do-it-yourself warehouse retailers, Georgia-Pacific building materials are available for your next construction project. 

SEE THE FULL RANGE OF ITEMS FIRSTHAND
Focused on Stewardship

Long-term success starts with the decisions we make each day. That’s why we work to maximize recycling, reduce energy use and set the standard in sustainable forestry. It’s all made possible by thousands of individual team members who speak up, share ideas, promote safety and create mutual benefit to help people improve their lives. We also partner with thousands of philanthropic organizations to remove barriers to opportunity, strengthen communities and empower others to achieve their full potential.

See how we're taking responsibility
ENVIRONMENTAL
SOCIAL
GOVERNANCE
Progress with Purpose

Our approach to stewardship encompasses the responsible management of our actions and the resources entrusted to our care in a manner that respects the rights of others and drives our approach to Environmental, Social and Corporate Governance (ESG) priorities. See our Progress with Purpose and learn how to utilize our  Stewardship Framework to prioritize the areas that create the most value for our customers, employees, and other constituents.

Transform Your Career

At Georgia-Pacific, we respect the rights and dignity of each individual. We work to remove barriers to opportunity so everyone can achieve their full potential. Our supportive environment places you in control of your professional development and advancement. Gain direct access to training opportunities, industry experts, hands-on experience and diverse roles at more than 150 locations. Find the job that’s right for you and keep growing.

FIND YOUR CAREER WITH GP
A network of resources

Georgia-Pacific is a Koch, Inc. company. Koch estimated annual revenues have exceeded $125 billion with businesses that employ 120,000 people worldwide across more than 60 countries. Koch companies build on each other’s expertise and capabilities to create shared efficiencies and greater value for employees, customers, suppliers and communities.

Custom Corrugated Packaging for Businesses

Get results-driven solutions from a dedicated team focused on earning your trust.

CONTACT US

Pause
A box isn’t just a box. Your packaging impacts your entire operation.

Productivity, warehousing space and transportation costs can all be affected by your packaging. Select custom corrugated packaging to fit every specification and budget.

By Service

Collaborate with experts in packaging design, engineering, testing and project management. Our wide range of services will set you up for success.

By Need

Explore corrugated packaging solutions for business, retail or direct to consumers that help contain, transport, protect, inform and promote your product.

By Industry

Discover some key industries leveraging corrugated to sustainably package their products. Let our breadth of experience guide you to the ideal solution.

SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

Corrugated is the most environmentally friendly packaging in the world.

Corrugated packaging is made from a renewable resource grown in managed forests and is the most recycled packaging material. PCA is also committed to:

Energy efficiency
Renewable energy resources
Responsible design, manufacturing and delivery

LEARN MORE ABOUT SUSTAINABILITY

A Message From PCA’s Customer Service Managers
Count on us to build outstanding service into everything we do.

A partnership with PCA isn’t just about buying boxes. Our employees are dedicated to building relationships, providing quality products and delivering an outstanding service experience. At PCA, our people make the difference.

EXPLORE OUR PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

From our containerboard mills to our box plants, we’re in markets where you need us.

As one of the largest producers of containerboard and corrugated packaging products in the U.S., PCA offers customers a world-class experience with local expertise.

FIND YOUR NEAREST LOCATION
Need to get the “hard to do” done?

Don’t worry if your project is complex or comes with stringent requirements. We’ll find the custom corrugated packaging solutions your business needs.

Global Leaders in Metal Packaging

Sonoco is proud to announce the successful completion of our acquisition of Eviosys. This integration deepens our metal packaging portfolio and expands our global footprint, establishing us as a leader in metal packaging solutions worldwide. Together, we are committed to driving sustainability and delivering high-quality packaging that meets our customers’ evolving needs while continuing to innovate for a better future.

Read the Press Release

Whether it’s as simple as delivering a convenient, nutritious snack after school or as complex as reducing food waste, feeding the hungry and preserving the planet—we have packaging solutions for you.

FEATURED MARKETS
Consumer
Industrial
Protective
Healthcare

Bringing healthy, fresh food to tables around the globe

Improving the safety and durability of things we rely on most—from cars to high-rises

Ensuring goods like refrigerators, washers and electronics arrive safely at their destination

Protecting medicines so they can reach people in need

We’re delighted that Sonoco’s EnviroCan® with paperboard end, part of our EnviroSense™ product range, is helping pladis on their journey to make its packaging easier to recycle and fulfill the requirements of its sustainability agenda. We’re looking forward to helping them with their other ranges in the future.

Philip Brown, UK Sales Manager, Sonoco Consumer Products Europe

At Pactiv Evergreen, Social Responsibility captures our uncompromising commitment to operating with integrity and ethics, and giving back to the communities where we work and live.

Our Social Responsibility platform features a robust, employee-led Give Back program, which includes a matching gifts plan, community grants initiative, and our annual Company-wide Month of Action campaign.

How We Give Back
Our Commitment to Sustainability

Our commitment to sustainability is foundational to our Purpose of Packaging a Better Future – and is guided by our Value to Do What’s Right to deliver sustainably manufactured products with ethics and integrity.

At Edgewell, motion is in our DNA. It’s in every product we make and every life we touch, and is the reason we chose a hummingbird as our emblem. We are always on the move to do better and be better; making personal care products that infuse joy into the everyday.

Never. Stop. Thriving.

Our well-loved and well-known family of brands feature products that bring joy to the everyday by helping you care for yourself, live life to the fullest, and express everything that makes you special and unique. We're proud to deliver a global portfolio of brands that provide confidence, protection, comfort, and quality when and where it matters most.

Our Brands 
Never. Stop. Caring.

We are on a sustainability journey, innovating products, transforming packaging, championing diversity, equity and inclusion, and doing our part to care for each other and our planet.

Our Mission 
Never. Stop. Smiling.

We are a people-first organization. From shareholders to consumers, we believe that everyone benefits when we nurture passion, encourage curiosity, inspire experimentation, and spread joy through our work.

Our Culture 
Never. Stop. Growing.

We find joy in cultivating a diverse, nurturing culture where good ideas thrive, and individuality is recognized. If you’re looking for a fulfilling career where you can make a meaningful impact, we’d love to have you join us.

THIS VIDEO HAS NO SOUND

Leading the way to a sustainable future with packaging and supply chain solutions. 


Menasha Corporation consists of two companies with one vision for a sustainable future.

Menasha Packaging is a North American supply chain leader, offering high-end packaging, unique displays and point-of-sale materials, among many other services.

ORBIS optimizes supply chains with sustainable packaging, including reusable containers, pallets, dunnage, bulk systems, and metal racks that reduce costs and enhance profitability.

No matter what you’re looking for, both companies can drive efficiency and innovation across your supply chain. It’s what we call The Power Behind Possible. Welcome to Menasha Corporation, a 175 year-old, family-owned company that’s dedicated to your business and the planet we all share.

Take a look at who we are, what we do, and why we've been around for 175 years.
Hear from our President & CEO, Chris Drees, about why we are excited about our 175th anniversary.
Our Companies

Menasha Packaging is the largest independent provider of packaging and supply chain service solutions in North America, designing, printing, and fulfilling graphic packaging, display and merchandising solutions for over 1,800 brands, both in-store and online.

Learn more

As an international, closed-loop supply chain leader, ORBIS offers reusable plastic totes, pallets, containers, protective interiors, carts, and metal racks to help world-class companies move their products faster, more sustainably, and more cost-effectively.

DESIGNING FOR THE FUTURE
Closing The Loop on CPG Packaging

According to the UNEP, “approximately 36% of all plastics produced are used in packaging, including single-use plastic products for food and beverage containers, approximately 85% of which ends up in landfills or as unregulated waste.”

Many CPG brands are focused on reducing and/or eliminating single-use plastics and looking toward solutions like reusable packaging to tackle this challenge. So how do we tackle a complex problem like this one? With right-sizing packaging solutions, material optimization and through innovations like the SPC Award winner, Jarbot™, Orora’s proprietary patent-pending reusable packaging solution

Our Sustainability Credo
We are a proud leader in the industry when it comes to the development of sustainable label solutions.

In fact, over 70% of projects in our pipeline are driven by improved recyclability. Our organizational emphasis on sustainability is multi-faceted, with three focus areas: our operations, our solutions, and our customers. By signing global pacts, we are demonstrating our commitment to minimizing environmental impact.

All About Innovation

MORE THAN 60 YEARS OF SUCCESS
OUTSTANDING SERVICE OUT-OF-THE-BOX THINKING

Delivering creative, attention-grabbing corrugated solutions takes more than top-of-the-line equipment. It also takes a dependable, responsive team of experts with a reputation for putting customers and their needs above all else. That’s BCI.

More About Us
WITH US, YOU GET THE WHOLE PACKAGE

BCI doesn’t just make boxes and we don’t just do the printing. We’re your single source for everything corrugated, from custom-designed ecommerce packages that become the star of every unboxing to retail point of purchase displays that demand attention.

INDUSTRIAL PACKAGING

DIGITAL PRINTING

BCI helps push your packaging and display designs to the next level, customizing them with colors and concepts that demand…

BCI PROVIDES CREATIVE END-TO-END CORRUGATED PACKAGING SERVICES FOR CUSTOMERS LOOKING FOR STRATEGIC, CUSTOMIZABLE SOLUTIONS
At BCI, our comprehensive manufacturing network, extensive industry experience, and strategic insights allow us to provide creative solutions that consistently deliver exceptional results. As a leading display and package design company, we provide a collaborative approach with a responsive, customer-focused culture that drives our passion for exceeding your expectations.

When it comes to selecting from the many package design companies in the US, look to BCI to provide industry-leading solutions for complicated and time-sensitive projects using our secure supply chain network and experienced team members dedicated to customer success.

Located in nine Southern and Midwestern states, BCI leverages our extensive nationwide capabilities and specialized equipment to deliver sustainable, long-term solutions with exceptional results.

More About Us
60+
YEARS OF SUCCESS
THOUSANDS OF PROJECTS COMPLETED WITH ABSOLUTE QUALITY

We’re no stranger to the never-before-done, complex or deadline driven project. In fact, customers have trusted us to complete their projects on time and on budget for the past 60 years. Bring us your biggest challenges and our people, equipment and dedication will get the job done.

Creative Play and Toy Division

Seasonal Division

ABOUT NOVOLEX

Novolex - A Leader in Choice, Innovation, and Sustainability

Novolex develops and manufactures diverse packaging products for the foodservice, delivery and carryout, food processor and industrial markets that touch nearly every aspect of daily life in multiple industries. The Novolex family of brands provides customers with innovative food and delivery packaging and performance solutions for their business needs today while investing in research and development to engineer more sustainable choices for the future.

Innovating Packaging Solutions

Innovation drives our business. Expert product development teams design products that can reduce the impact of packaging on the environment, offer convenience, reduce costs, minimize food waste, and exceed customer expectations. Our continuous drive to innovate has enabled us to develop unique products that solve challenges around the globe.

Product Innovation

OUR BUSINESS

Markets Served
View more 
Food Packaging

Foodservice packaging customers include quick service and traditional dine-in restaurants, institutional and cafeteria settings, entertainment venues and C-stores that offer food.

Delivery & Carryout

Delivery and carry-out includes restaurants that prepare food for delivery or carry-out as well as grocery and convenience stores.

Industrial

Industrial markets include businesses in the e-commerce, agriculture and horticulture, banking and security, construction, sanitation and janitorial, and healthcare sectors.

Food Processor

Food processers include commercial beverage manufacturers, produce suppliers, and dairy and confectionary producers.

Menasha Makes It Happen.


You can count on Menasha for everything from custom shipping boxes to letter-perfect packaging to creating and fulfilling breakthrough displays and special packs. But we don’t stop there.

We transform supply chains into value chains by making them more digitized, sustainable and cost-effective. And we’re there with the support, service and scale our customers need to grow in an omnichannel world.

When it comes to strategic problem solving, eye-catching executions and transformational ideas that win in the circular economy, Menasha Makes It Happen.

A history of packaging and supply chain innovation

Menasha Packaging Company and ORBIS Corporation are proud subsidiaries of Menasha Corporation, a family-owned business celebrating 175 years. We are both leaders in sustainable packaging and supply chain solutions that maximize customers’ performance.

Golden West is the proud packaging partner of some of the world’s most valuable brands.
MANUFACTURING CUSTOM PACKAGING SOLUTIONS THAT COMPLEMENT YOUR BRAND

For over seven decades, Golden West has been the premier packaging provider for fast-growing brands.

Global Footprint

With 33 available manufacturing locations, we will always be where you need us. 24 hours a day. 7 days a week. Call us, email, or have one of our talented consultants stop by and see you in person. Our people are the difference and we love what we do!

Endless Options

When we approach your design solution, we have multiple substrates available to create the optimal package for your brand. We’re a leading manufacturer of custom corrugated packaging and can also develop high-performance and eye-catching packaging from paper, plastic, foam, wood, tin, and acrylic.

Ask An Expert

With over 70 years of experience, our design and manufacturing teams have seen it all. We know what works, (and what doesn’t) and proactively show our clients fresh ideas and trends to keep your brand current and getting noticed.

Economy of Scale

As the largest mill independent packaging company in the West, we can leverage our size to get you the best possible cost on all of our designs. Multiple facilities with redundant capabilities ensure maximum flexibility when you need it.

Elegantly Designed High-Performance Packaging

If you can dream it, we can make it. Our structural engineers and graphic designers utilize a variety of materials, structures, and techniques to create custom product boxes and printed packaging that reflect the quality of your product and brand.

About American Greetings

For more than 100 years, American Greetings has helped the world become a more thoughtful and caring place. American Greetings has ecards, SmashUps™ and Creatacards you can email or print from home. All ecards and Creatacards are customizable and even free with your no-risk trial!

Don't wait — join American Greetings to print out all the Christmas cards you need to mail, schedule birthday ecards for all your friends and much, much, more! The best part is that you can personalize and send any of our digital greetings for free with a 7-day trial membership.

Subscribe to our emails for inspiration and new ideas, behind the scenes, what to write in a greeting card and free app downloads. American Greetings is here to help you make a meaningful connection with ecards and Creatacards for holidays, birthdays and everyday.

The Leader in Flexible & Specialty Rigid Packaging

With our advanced printing methods, focus on sustainability, and extensive manufacturing and converting capabilities, we take your packaging to the next level.

Get Started
Existing Customer?
Trusted by Leading Brands

For more than 60 years, we’ve been at the forefront of packaging, delivering superior customer experiences fueled by impactful market insights, innovative sustainable packaging products, and rapidly scalable services that ensure our customers’ products stand out on the grocery shelves.

Our Key Capabilities

Printpack leads the packaging industry in manufacturing capabilities while delivering a best-in-class customer experience. We are committed to Preserving and Enhancing People’s Lives through sustainability, efficient processes, and providing quality products to our customers and consumers.

Flexible Packaging

Our vertically integrated manufacturing approach includes flexographic, rotogravure, and digital printing, along with extrusion and adhesive lamination capabilities.

Specialty Rigid Packaging

Our specialty rigid packaging includes barrier co-extrusion and thermoforming capabilities.

Healthcare Packaging

Our healthcare packaging includes header bags, peelable pouches, and forming films that protect the integrity of medical devices and equipment.

Value-Added Services
Graphics and Prepress

We offer a multitude of the latest prepress technologies for exceptional print quality. Improved color saturation, ink transfer, image highlight detail, and expanded tonal range are just a few of the ways we can improve the visual impact of your package.

Learn More
Analytical Lab
Field Service Team
Innovation Sessions
Sustainability

We believe that the use of sustainable materials for packaging is the future. To that end, we have a team dedicated to developing Printpack Preserve™ packaging structures which include recycled content, recyclable plastic, paper, and compostable materials. With over 100 pre-qualified letters, we are committed to helping our customers not only improve their speed to market but also reach their sustainability goals.

Our Sustainability Initiatives
Recycled Content

Recycled content packaging is recognized by consumers for its environmental benefits, making it easy for brands to connect with customers.

Curbside Recyclable Paper

Paper packaging is the most widely recycled type of packaging because it is curbside recyclable.

Compostable packaging

Printpack has a portfolio of compostable films, inks, and adhesives to allow brands to design for certified-compostable packaging.

Recyclable Polyethylene

Our pre-qualified recyclable polyethylene (PE) packaging offers many of the benefits of current flexible packaging with one huge advantage - store drop off recycling.

Why Printpack?
Best-In-Class Customer Service

We develop a true understanding of the customer as an organization and as individuals to build custom packaging solutions for their brand.

Innovative Solutions

We work with brands to create packaging that drives progress and achieves a competitive advantage in an ever-changing market.

Powerful Supply Chain Expertise

We’ll partner with you to design a customer-centric order and inventory management program to ensure your packaging supply chain runs smoothly, efficiently and transparently - every day.

Experts in Multiple Packaging Formats

We help brands deliver custom, leading-edge package designs that stand out on the shelf in a wide variety of markets.

A global specialty packaging pioneer, CCL is the largest label company in the world and provides innovative solutions to the Home & Personal Care, Premium Food & Beverage, Healthcare & Specialty, Automotive & Durables and Consumer markets worldwide. The Company is divided into four reporting segments: CCL , Avery, Checkpoint and Innovia.

With approximately 26,000 dedicated employees, we operate 213 state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in North America, South America, Europe, Asia, Australia and Africa.

Our approach to corrugated paper and logistics is anything but ordinary.
THE SCHWARZ PROMISE

We’re making a truly renewable resource, and we’re doing it with the highest quality and customer service.

WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF CORRUGATED

From the package that arrived on your porch this morning to the recycled box you used to make last year’s Halloween costume—corrugated material is everywhere. Nearly all consumer goods are packaged, stored, or delivered with it. At Schwarz Partners, our portfolio of companies is responsible for producing 6% of the industry’s corrugated goods.

About Us

CAREERS
Help shape tomorrow at Schwarz Partners

At Schwarz Partners, you can learn, grow and test yourself in a culture of continuous improvement—all while doing important work that impacts every aspect of our daily lives.

As a valued member of our family, you’ll have chances to try new things—whether taking on a new project or learning a new skill. We empower you to take charge of your own career. Everyone on our team is eager to lend a helping hand and bright ideas are given a chance to shine.

In our positive environment, you will find that your voice is heard. After all, we want you to think outside the box so that we can reshape the packaging and logistics landscape across the globe—your ideas matter here.

We strive to create a workplace that is inclusive by encouraging respect, appreciation and recognition of all viewpoints, where everyone can be their authentic self and where that authenticity is celebrated as a strength.

Shurtape Technologies, LLC, is a leading manufacturer and marketer of adhesive tape and consumer home and office products, with facilities in the United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Mexico, Peru, Denmark, Australasia, United Arab Emirates and China. Together, our subsidiaries serve numerous markets, including DIY, home products, industrial/MRO, building and construction, packaging, HVAC, professional paint, automotive, marine, aerospace, arts and entertainment, graphic arts, sound control, medical and retail.

In addition to specialty adhesive solutions, we offer products under recognizable brand names such as Duck®, FrogTape®, Painter’s Mate®, Shurtape®, T-Rex®, Kip® and Pro Tapes®.

Why Signode
Why Signode
Signode and its well-known brands are recognized around the world for improving load integrity and protection, while maximizing cost-efficiency and streamlining operations. Our firm commitment to research and innovation has resulted in customer-focused product innovations that continue to address the market’s ever-changing supply chain needs.  

From a singular protective packaging product to full turnkey packaging solutions, we have the expertise, experience and resources to find solutions to your packaging challenges. An unequalled breadth of solutions that protect your products during manufacturing, transport, storage and distribution.
Learn More About Us
Solutions

We offer a comprehensive portfolio of end-of-line packaging products and systems designed to protect, secure, simplify and streamline the bulk transportation of goods, continually adapting our product line to address evolving supply chain demands.

Pack

Our packing solutions contain and protect your products for direct shipment to your customers or for additional end-of-line packaging.

Learn More

Bundle

Our bundling solutions organize and consolidate your products for safe shipment or palletizing.

Learn More

Unitize

Our unitizing solutions help palletize and protect products for secure transport and storage.

Learn More

Warehouse

Our automated warehousing solutions enable you to efficiently store and retrieve your products.

Learn More

Transport

Our transportation solutions stabilize your loads by preventing excessive product movement during transport by road, rail, sea or air.

Learn More

Redefining the Packaging Life Cycle

Formed in 2018 by packaging industry leaders BWAY, MAUSER Group, National Container Group (NCG) and Industrial Container Services (ICS), we're Mauser Packaging Solutions.

 

With our global network of manufacturing, reconditioning, and recycling facilities, we deliver high-quality, sustainable packaging solutions across the full packaging life cycle - closing the packaging loop.

 

We're Redefining Sustainability and providing solutions that have a positive impact on businesses and the planet.

Read More
180+ facilities around the globe

We deliver the packaging solutions customers need, anywhere in the world. The breadth of our global network, together with our full lifecycle capabilities—create supply chain consistency and superior packaging performance that no other company can provide.

View Our Locations
Your trusted industry partner

From food, beverage, personal care and pharmaceuticals to chemicals, petrochemicals, agrochemicals and paints, we work with customers in a broad range of industries to solve complex packaging challenges—simply and sustainably. Our passion for innovation, collaboration and creativity makes us the go-to partner.

THE TRANZONIC COMPANIES – PART OF YOUR LIFE EVERY DAY IN EVERY WAY

Founded nearly a century ago, The Tranzonic Companies provides an unsurpassed portfolio of cleaning, maintenance, absorbents and personal protection products. Headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, the company manufactures and distributes products across multiple industries, including commercial, industrial, institutional and business consumer sectors from food service to automotive to medical. The Knoxville location in Tennessee is the largest manufacturing and distribution facility for The Tranzonic Companies.

Our products provide everyday protection with a commitment to quality and innovation.

INNOVATIVE PACKAGING SOLUTIONS
YOU CAN TRUST.
Healthy people. Healthy planet. Healthy supply chain.

We believe in the interconnectedness of health and sustainability, where fostering healthy individuals, a thriving planet, and a resilient supply chain converge to shape a better future for all.

LEARN MORE
Process

Atlantic Packaging is home to the most advanced research, testing, and monitoring equipment in the packaging industry.

Expertise in Action

Atlantic’s Packaging Solution Center is the heartbeat of our advanced approach, where technical skill meets data-driven precision. Our process is a blend of innovation and expertise, guided by engineers working day-to-day with packaging applications that span a massive variety of industries and unique challenges.

LEARN MORE

“We strive to help our customers reduce their packaging footprint through technical optimization while also delivering packaging materials that are circular, effective, and balanced. At Atlantic, we believe the packaging supply chain can evolve to be net positive for our planet. We will lead that effort through life-affirming innovations in packaging. This is who we are.”

Wes Carter
President, Atlantic Packaging

Pioneering Excellence.

ATLANTIC PACKAGING’S SUPPLY CHAIN INNOVATION.

Through groundbreaking technologies, collaborative partnerships, and an unwavering dedication to environmental stewardship, we’re forging a path toward a better future for industries and communities worldwide.

LEARN MORE

MUST

Sustainably optimize the stretch film application process for consistent load containment and to minimize film entering the waste stream.

CANOPY

With Canopy™ Wrap, you can transition to fully curbside-recyclable bundling for bottles and cans by replacing traditional shrink film with a recyclable fiber wrap solution.

CRUZ FOAM

Cruz Foam, derived from sustainably sourced chitin found in shrimp shells, not only diverts waste from landfills but also replaces conventional packaging foam, thereby contributing to a circular economy.

FIBRESTRAP

FibreStrap is the world’s first fiber-based, sustainable zip tie. Made for bundling and attaching just about any product or item, FibreStrap can easily be used as a replacement for traditional fossil plastic cable ties. 

FISHBONE

Fishbone beverage carriers are curbside-recyclable paperboard carriers designed for your beverage packaging needs, offering eco-friendly materials, ample branding space, and efficient application through equipment options.

GUARDIAN TAPING SYSTEM

When an optimized amount of high-quality tape is applied consistently at scale, you see increased product protection and a reduction in overall tape usage and waste.

CURBSIDE RECYCLABLE MAILERS

Sustainable replacement for bubble and poly mailers. Improve sustainability and operational efficiency at scale with our automated curbside-recyclable mailing solutions.

PAPERFORM

Paperform offers a sustainable alternative to traditional single-use plastic blister packs, using renewable paperboard that is curbside recyclable. paperform can be applied using exisiting blister pack equipment.

Our Defining Difference

For 75 years, we’ve made waves across the Atlantic. Today, we continue driving transformation through culture, policy, and innovation.

LEARN MORE

CULTURE

Our vibrant culture is a fusion of diversity, sustainability commitment, cutting-edge technology, and unwavering values.

Our employees have worked with us for generations, helping us evolve to become the industry leader we are today.

CLIENTS

At Atlantic, we love our clients. That’s why we’re committed to delivering top-notch solutions for all their packaging needs, so we can succeed together.

INNOVATION

We’re focused on bringing you sophisticated design, technical ability, and innovative products.

Explore our original systems, like MUST Monitoring, Atlantic’s patented hardware and software data-recording system that monitors every load wrapped on a given stretch wrapper.

This comprehensive load containment system takes a holistic approach to your stretch wrapping operation, setting and holding the correct standards and preventing shipping damage.

Explore Atlantic Packaging
PLAY VIDEO
Partner Testimonials

“Ranpak is proud to have Atlantic Packaging as a valued partner in our pursuit of a more circular economy. Atlantic’s commitment to sustainability is inspiring and is evident in everything they do – from their significant environmentally-friendly operational footprint to their selection of product families, like Ranpak’s. Atlantic is crafting a future that fosters a more sustainable supply chain.”

Omar Asali
Chairman and CEO, Ranpak

 

“Coca-Cola Consolidated is honored to partner with Atlantic Packaging to create a pilot closed-loop recycling program around stretch film, as it complements our current closed-loop systems around different types of packaging materials. By working together, we can improve the packaging for our supply chain as well as look at alternative material like PCR and provide more sustainable solutions. As the largest Coca-Cola bottler in the U.S., we are leading the way in this innovation, and we look forward to the outcomes and to potentially expand this to our other facilities.”

Melanie Sabella
VP Technical Services, Coca-Cola Consolidated

WINGATE FOCUSES ON STORY DEALS

Wingate Partners was founded in 1987 to purchase controlling equity investments in basic industries such as manufacturing, distribution and industrial services.  Wingate focuses on complex “story deals” that include companies that are under-performing potential, exist in difficult or out-of-favor industries, are carve-outs or are navigating management transitions. Our philosophy is to create value by supporting management in their efforts to improve the operations of the company.  The Partners of Wingate have substantial senior-level operating experience and extensive careers in acquiring companies.

ACQUISITION CRITERIA
Control investments
$50 to $250 million in revenue with critical mass in industry niche
Equity investments of $10 to $40 million
Manufacturing, distribution and services
Profitable or unprofitable
Will partner with management or provide new management

Rusken Packaging (Rusken) is a dynamic, modern, integrated corrugated packaging company with locations throughout the United States. With nineteen (19) facilities in ten (10) states, Rusken is a forward-looking regional organization.

Services

Our portfolio of packaging services is the foundation we were built upon. We enjoy and embrace the notion that every project and every client is unique. In fact, close to 80% of our business involves some kind of customization!

Custom Design

We offer comprehensive in-house design capabilities to create the right sized packaging solution for your specific needs. Our tenured network of corrugated design experts across our 19 locations can assist you to refresh a legacy design or create a new solution from the ground up!

The Anchor Advantage

A global innovation leader in designing and manufacturing rigid food containers and food service cling film in the USA since 1963. Committed to protecting food and the environment by using materials that reduce food and packaging waste to conserve valuable natural resources while delivering what the chef intended. Our partners at restaurant chains, supermarkets, convenience stores, food processors, and the distributors that warehouse and ship to these market segments utilize our award-winning performance features in durable packaging that preserves food quality, taste, and texture.

Performance

Durable, leak-resistant seals that remain closed during handling and transit

Unique

Award-winning designs to deliver the quality of food the chef intended

Reliable

Redundant tooling and BRC-certified facilities ensure consistent supply

Quality

High-clarity materials in designs that prevent order errors and drive impulse sales

Versatile

Preserve and protect hot and cold foods to minimize costs while eliminating waste

Reuse

Recloseable packages that are dishwasher-safe and recyclable after multiple uses

Mapping the Way to a More Sustainable Future

Great Northern exists to serve its customers, team members and the communities in which we work.

For our team members, we deliver on building a people-centric culture, developing leaders from within, and sending people home fulfilled about their role and contributions. For our customers, challenges are met with an undying commitment to doing what others can’t or won’t. For our communities, we strive to make a difference with environmental, social, and governance initiatives that unite us and ensure a better future together.

We are making a difference for our community, environment, customers, and team members.

Our Product Portfolio

Our brands help many customers solve in-store display, merchandising, packaging, and shipping challenges in the most sustainable way possible.

With our varied product offerings and many value-added services, rest assured Great Northern can handle your challenges in their entirety.

View Our Portfolio View Our Value-Added Services

Making a Difference ESG Program

Our ESG program is entering its seventh year of success. We have responded to many requests about our program from customers who use this information to support their own programs.

Great Northern uses a variety of outside ESG auditors at our customers’ request. These include EcoVadis, Sedex, and CDP.

Great Northern provides an annual Report to the Community each January that looks back at the past year’s ESG accomplishments.

ESG Program

What WCP Does for Our Customers
FIND A LOCATION
CONSULT

We listen to your needs and provide advice, guidance, education, opinions, ideas, and solutions. We have over one hundred sales consultants. Consider WCP your team of consultants!

SOURCE

We seek products for you through our relationships with manufacturers. We source from over 1000 supplier relationships. Let us find what you need.

STOCK

We procure products you need from manufacturers and store them in one of our 14 regional warehouse locations. We provide the necessities to keep your business running. Whether it’s stock or custom manufactured, we can store it locally for your immediate needs – just in time.

DELIVER

Big yellow trucks deliver orders to your door by our team of trustworthy drivers. You’ll get to know them by name as they are friendly and reliable… and, they get to know you.

SERVE

Local warehouses, local customer service, local sales consultants, local management – we are local people, living in our community here to serve you in person, over the phone, or online!

Our Commitment to You
We aim to be THE reliable, most-trusted source for folding carton packaging.  We have a relentless drive for excellence.  Malnove is always united and fiercely independent.

Through our manufacturing excellence, skilled and engaged workforce, world class customer success, and industry expertise, we are the partner you need.

Choosing the wrong supplier can lead to:

Wasting time
Struggling to be heard
Frustration when needs not met
Limited alternative options
Delaying orders
Disappointing Customers

As a family-owned and -operated company we’ll be your partner so you can improve your performance and make your business thrive.

Our certifications demonstrate our dedication to quality, accountability, and environmental stewardship.

If you would like to learn more, please visit our Quality Systems & Certifications or Sustainability pages.

We know how important it is for you to fulfill orders for your customers on time, and we understand how complex and frustrating packaging can be. After all, we’ve been in the business for over seventy years! In that time, companies like yours have partnered with us to run billions of our folding cartons and install over 1,000 complete packaging systems, including product handling, cartoning, case packing, palletizing, and line controls. 

When you have a business to manage, the last thing you need to worry about is whether your product’s packaging is underperforming. Our team will serve as your packaging partner, and you’ll want to use our packaging for every product you sell.

About Tension
Direct Mail & Printed Products

Catch your recipient’s attention with an expertly crafted direct mailpiece. Tension’s eye-catching direct mail envelopes and printed products are available in a variety of papers, inks and styles.

Transactional Envelopes

Make a statement with your billing and other transactional mailpieces. Tension’s custom business envelopes can help you deliver your bills, invoices, statements or fundraising appeal that inform and engage your customers.

PACKAGING & AUTOMATION
Tension Packaging & Automation Delivers Solutions on a Promise.

We get it. Expectations are high. Tension Packaging & Automation demands excellence when developing protective packaging solutions. The Royal Group is owned by Schwarz Partners LP, a privately held, second-generation company headquartered out of Indianapolis, IN. Schwarz Partners owns a portfolio of like-minded companies across the country such as paper mills, corrugated sheet manufacturers and converters, as well as logistics and transportation companies. By leveraging this vast network, The Royal Group can provide industry leading service to our customers.

AMERICA'S PRODUCTIVITY PARTNER SINCE 1971

Since 1971, GBS has been a leading information solutions provider, partnering with some of the world’s most established brand names as well as smaller forward-thinking organizations.

Our team understands the value of identifying and investing in new technologies that improve the way our customers do business. From developing feature-rich software solutions to deploying advanced print and marketing services, we’re always engaged in the newest technology because we know how high-tech can translate to high productivity.

We are a 100% employee-owned company, and our culture is one that values people, their commitment to meeting customers’ needs and the expertise that enables them to successfully do so.

We’re committed to promoting an inclusive and sustainable environment through awareness, education and achievement as a corporate citizen of the world. From organizational integrity to customer centricity, we are dedicated to trustworthy corporate citizenship – and to you.

At Fortis Solutions Group, we create outstanding packaging solutions for our customers which create a powerful advantage in the marketplace through industry leading lead times, quality control, color management and solutions-oriented approaches. We deliver a breadth of product offerings including pressure sensitive labels, shrink sleeves, flexible packaging, folding cartons, and label applicators.

Sustainability
Built on longevity
We measure excellence in the length and strength of our customer relationships.
Built on quality
High-quality market pulp

Our state-of-the-art facility produces dry market pulp that becomes printing paper, tissue, pet pads, insulated doors, filtration paper, Kraft paper, and more.

MARKET PULP
Premium paperboard

Each year, we produce 300,000 metric tons of premium paperboard for cartons and cups, equivalent to six billion liter-sized cartons of milk.

PAPERBOARD
Built on sustainability

Customers care about where our chips come from and how our mill operates. We source raw materials from responsibly managed forests and lean on our scientific staff to employ environmentally sound practices in creating products.

ENVIRONMENTAL EFFORTS
Built on people

We wouldn’t be Nippon Dynawave Packaging without the people who come to work with us each day and the support of the community that we call home.

We’re committed to offering a dynamic work environment focused on safety, professional excellence, delighting customers, and giving back to the community in any way we can.

Welcome to SMC Packaging Group

SMC Packaging Group is a full-service provider of corrugated packaging, point-of-purchase displays, protective shipping cartons, and ancillary packaging supplies. For over 50 years, SMC has been dedicated to responding to your needs, offering solutions to meet your unique challenges, and providing exemplary customer service.

LEARN MORE ABOUT US
CORE VALUES
CORE VALUES
INNOVATION
SERVICE
QUALITY
SUSTAINABILITY
QUALITY
SUSTAINABILITY
INNOVATION
SERVICE
SMC Packaging Group’s breadth of capabilities means we’re equipped to find a custom corrugated solution to meet your unique challenges.
BOXES
CORRUGATED BOXES

If it can be made out of corrugated, we have the equipment to do it. Whatever shape, style, or configuration, we should be able to convert it at one of our manufacturing locations. Let us go to work to find the box that fits your needs.

DISPLAYS
CORRUGATED DISPLAYS

Our structural and graphic designers are very experienced in helping brands stand out in the marketplace. With litho label, digital print, direct print inside or outside the box, and our own ink kitchen, we're ready to help you sell your product.


PACKAGING
SUPPLIES & EQUIPMENT

SMC is committed to supplying packaging, ancillary products, and equipment to our clients in the marketplace. Our dedicated team is ready to help with your basic or custom equipment needs as well. If it touches the box, we can help you with it!

Join the SMC Team

Join our expanding organization for an exciting career with a company at the forefront of manufacturing. A position at SMC Packaging Group represents a dedication to excellence in safety, sustainability, quality, and innovation. We provide meaningful and challenging work in a collaborative environment where you can make a difference, supported by the values of a family-owned business.

SMC CAREERS
Efficient, responsible, sustainable business

We are committed to sustainable and environmentally responsible practices because it's good for the planet, good for our customers, and good for business.

SMC SUSTAINABILITY GOALS
Investing in the community

We actively participate in civic, charitable, and social groups to have a positive impact on the community. We stay connected in our communities, not out of a sense of obligation, or because we believe we will benefit from that connection—we do it because SMC Cares.

What began as a division of 3M, focusing on carbonless paper and the prototype creation of what is now known as Post-It Notes has grown into a multi-faceted company of five key brands: Nekoosa Coated Products, RTape, Catalina Graphic Films, Mojave Digital Media and CET Films; with a constant desire to expand our product portfolio.

Got it!

WHY WE EXIST
	


 
	
Keeping things cold in transit is painfully at odds with keeping the planet cool. Cold chain solutions like styrofoam are incredibly energy intense to produce, are in use for an average of only 36 hours, and spend the remainder of their lives in a landfill. That's why we started TemperPack and have quickly grown to become the largest sustainable alternative to styrofoam for cold chain shipments in food and life science. We're an innovative sustainable materials company focused on eliminating plastic from the supply chain.
We manufacture products out of 3 facilities strategically located across the country to serve fulfillment centers everywhere.
	
Featured in the Ellen MacArthur Foundation's Upstream Innovation Guide for sustainable alternatives in packaging.
	
0
Shipments protected to date using our sustainable alternative, ClimaCell, Green Cell, and WaveKraft.
	
TemperPack is a proud member of the How2Recycle® program.

The How2Recycle program is a division of the Sustainable Packaging Coalition, developed to increase awareness and ease around how to dispose of packaging. To learn more about the program, click here.

Work With Us

We’ve helped dozens of companies reduce their packaging costs and lower their overall impact on the environment. Give us a shout and we’ll work with you to develop a solution that suits your shipping needs.

GET IN TOUCH

WHAT SETS US APART

Since 1976, IPS Packaging & Automation has strived to be an end-to-end packaging solution provider with a proven return on investment for all businesses. Today, we’ve grown to become a nationwide distributor for most of the leading manufacturers of packaging supplies and equipment in the country.

Package Design

Our engineers work with you from the beginning to the end to create a unique packaging design to meet all of your needs. Customizable packaging creates space, increases productivity and reduces costs even for the most complex issues.

Nationwide Warehouses

With warehouses strategically located, we can ensure faster delivery of what you need.

Sustainable Future

Our goal is to significantly reduce the environmental impact of packaging. We aim to achieve this by offering protection and functionality while utilizing renewable, biodegradable, and recyclable materials. Our efforts extend to minimizing waste and lowering energy consumption throughout the production process.

Why ABX?
Customized Solutions

Every solution starts with a conversation - and we're good listeners. Whether you're looking for a barrier to extend your product's shelf life, eye-popping graphics to help it stand out on the shelf, or improved machinability for faster run rates on temperamental packaging lines, we'll use every tool at our disposal to give you the right advice and recommendations.

Knowledge & Experience

With decades of experience, our sales and technical staff has worked with nearly every packaging machine and application in the market. We use this experience to packaging solutions that run faster and with less waste - whether you're running state-of-the- high-speed lines or your oldest and most challenging machines.

Commitment to Partnerships

We are committed to building strong partnerships with every customer. We know that understanding your business will help us support your growth. That's why our dedicated operations, product design, and customer care teams strive to deliver our best to you, every time.


Problem Solving

Have an issue with your current product, application, or
equipment? We thrive on challenges. Never ones to give up, we will work with you to help solve your most challenging packaging problems - and make a positive impact on your bottom line.

Pay Less for Premium Labels!
GET A QUOTE TODAY
Thermal Transfer Labels

Thermal transfer labels are a low-cost, high-value solution for nearly any labeling project. They require a thermal transfer ribbon in order to produce an image. Ink is transferred from the ribbon to the label in order to produce a clear, high-quality image.

THERMAL TRANSFER LABELS
Direct Thermal Labels 

Direct thermal labels are produced with an ink-embedded paper, eliminating the need for a thermal transfer ribbon. They create an image of the same clarity as a thermal transfer label and ribbon, cut down on printer changeover time, and are ideal for short-term projects.

DIRECT THERMAL LABELS
Thermal Transfer Ribbons

Thermal transfer ribbons are the source of the ink that is printed onto thermal transfer labels. The ink is transferred onto the label as it runs over a thermal printhead, resulting in a consistent and durable printed product.

THERMAL TRANSFER RIBBONS
Color Thermal Labels

Buckeye Business Products has 14 stock colors available.  We can also match your PMS code if you have a specific color that you need.

COLOR THERMAL LABELS
Freezer Grade Labels

Our freezer grade labels stick as low as negative 40 degrees.  They are perfect for blast freezer, below zero applications.

FREEZER GRADE LABELS
Auto Apply Labels

Have a label applicator?  We make the perfect print & apply labels for your machine.  Check out our stock sizes.

AUTO APPLY LABELS
Why Buckeye Business Products?
Single Point of Contact

We know that accuracy, reliability, and trust is vital for you. That’s why you’ll have an individual sales representative expert to fully take care of your account and any questions you may have. You’ll get the best service, the best products, and will never waste time talking to a machine. You deserve the best customer service possible and Buckeye Business Products is ready to deliver.

In-House Adhesive Plant

Here at Buckeye Business Products, we have invested in our own adhesive plant, giving us increased control over the quality of our products and an increased ability to drive down costs, resulting in savings that we pass on to our loyal customers.  Our adhesive is high-quality and durable in a variety of environments for all your labeling needs.

Same-Day Shipping

Buckeye Business Products understands the importance of on-time shipments, especially when it comes to labels. We offer same-day shipping on all stock items in order to ensure that you have the labels you need exactly when you need them. Eliminate lead times and order today before 3 PM for same-day shipping for labels that are offered at the lowest prices on the market.

120+ Stock Items

Our plant and warehouse allow us to stock more than 120 different sized labels. We have millions of labels on the shelf ready to ship at a moment’s notice.

Buy Factory Direct

We manufacture our own labels and sell directly to end users. As a result, we provide a high-quality product while eliminating the increased costs of an extended supply chain.

High Quality Products

We make sure our labels are of the highest quality. We have rigorous quality control tests done on our products so they always work for your needs. We are proud to offer a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee.

About Buckeye Business Products 

Since our founding in 1896 as Buckeye Carbon & Ribbon, Buckeye Business Products has been helping businesses put ink on paper. We are a label manufacturing company with a tradition of innovation in the consumable industry stretching back more than 110 years. We source our paper, silicone, and adhesive from across the globe and bring them to our 600,000 square foot manufacturing facility in order to produce high-quality, low-cost goods. We also stock an extensive catalog of labels and ribbons: more than 120 label sizes and 30 different ribbons ready to ship same-day nationwide.  Our drive to provide superior products at a competitive price has made us a valuable partner to thousands of customers throughout North America.

Specialty Paper and Tissue for a Greener Tomorrow

For years BiOrigin Specialty Products has been perfecting the craft of sustainable specialty paper and tissue products, designed to do just about anything for just about anyone. From antimicrobial coatings that fight off germs in the medical space to water based barriers that lock-in flavors for our Food Service clients.

Food Services

Innovative Food Service and QSR paper products are our bread and butter.

See Why

The Innovation of Paper Starts Here.

What’s so innovative about BSP’s paper? Well, it’s a complex science that boils down to the ABCs. How you choose to mix-and-match them is entirely up to you!

Appearance
Beautiful, sustainable paper products that look good on any shelf.
Barrier
Specially-formulated coatings that keep whatever you want out, out, and whatever you want in, in.
Containment
Proprietary technologies that seal your products off from the outside world.
Learn More
Not Just Scientific, Sustainable.

At BiOrigin Specialty Products, we use a scientific and data-driven approach to sustainability. From design to end-of-life, all of our products are developed and engineered to maximize performance and meet the unique sustainability objectives of converters and brands across North America.

Sure, we could dazzle you with buzzwords like “eco-friendly” and “green,” but we take it ten steps further by sharing the science behind our products with you, and showing you what makes them sustainable - down to the very last molecule.

Learn More

Who we are.

The integrated capabilities of the Blower-Dempsay Corporation bring together our network of experts in primary and secondary packaging, packaging equipment and line systems, conveyors and automation, material handling, warehousing programs, inventory control, and logistics to produce a single source solution for your wide variety of packaging needs.

Pacific Flexible Solutions is uniquely positioned to deliver the optimal solution for any of your flexible packaging needs. We bring together a vast experience in materials, design, engineering and manufacturing, plus proven global alliances to deliver leading edge packaging solutions.

Pacific Wester Container specializes in turning retail insight and consumer trends into successful merchandising solutions. Our team of industry professionals collaborate with clients to produce hi-impact packaging and displays that demand attention, drive traffic and promote brand awareness.

Pacific Conveyor Systems designs, installs and manufactures custom conveyors along with automated production and packaging systems. PCS specializes in stainless steel conveyors for the food, pharmaceutical, and electronic industries as well as custom material handling equipment.

Blower-Dempsay Corp. is your one-stop solutions provider, bringing together the expertise of four interconnected divisions specializing in all aspects of custom packaging

Skip to Content
Innovate with leading materials for a better tomorrow

From housing to pharmaceuticals, our cutting-edge technologies drive essential products that protect and enhance everyday life.

GET STARTED
Vital beyond measure

You can find Arclin everywhere.


Our technologies make your homes and cars safe, your food and fields grow, your water clean, and your pharmaceuticals pure. These vital, everyday products can’t fail—and we’re here to give you an extra layer of performance and peace of mind.


We create films, fertilizers, demulsifiers, overlays, fibers, solvents... and hundreds of other technologies that refine products you use every day.


Our team uses years of experience to constantly refine our technologies to be cut from the highest quality—making sure they can solve the changing needs of our customers and last a lifetime.

ABOUT ARCLIN
PRODUCTS BY CATEGORY
Find the products you need
14 TYPES

Search by product type

Browse our Engineered Building Solutions and Performance Polymer technologies, sorted by product type.

ALL PRODUCT TYPES
8 BRANDS

ALL BRANDS
10 INDUSTRIES

Search by industry

Discover your product options for needs in industries like energy & mining, building & construction, water treatment, and more.

ALL INDUSTRIES
ALL PRODUCTS
Our impact is all around

You just may not realize it. For more than 50 years, we’ve been creating, testing, and improving essential technologies for products the world can’t live without.

Our repository covers a variety of both engineered building solutions and performance polymers. Whether you need the perfect surface film for construction or quality peptide coupling for medicine, our vast selection of materials reinforce performance and drive precision.

EXPLORE ALL PRODUCTS
We’re moving towards a more sustainable future

Arclin has long been focused on reducing our environmental footprint. Over two decades ago, we installed our first state-of-the-art technology to eliminate more than 95% of our facilities’ emissions. Today, that tech continues to exceed regulatory demands.

EXPLORE OUR FOOTPRINT
Build with materials that stand the test of time

The things you’re building matter. You deserve durable, quality solutions that improve your products’ performance and differentiate them from the competition. So we can be sure (and you can be sure) that you’re receiving the best quality technologies in the market.

In today’s rapidly changing world, innovating new products and processes is vital. Our team pays special attention to market trends from electronics to pharmaceuticals. We listen to our customers’ unique business needs and look for opportunities to reduce runoff, waste, and environmental impact. And then we create new solutions that are even better—in durability, performance, and sustainability. Our standard is end-to-end innovation, year over year.

Our driving force is to serve you well. Because you deserve a hands-on partner who cares about what you’re building. Our experts work side-by-side with our customers to solve their complex problems—adept in finding products to fit unique requirements, explaining how to install, and answering the nitty gritty questions. Tell us what you’re looking for or what challenge you’re up against, and we’ll make sure you’re equipped with exactly what you need.

We’re committed to uplift our community
LEARN HOW
Bring your project to life

Craft your competitive edge and create the best product possible. Tell us what materials you’re looking for, and an expert will reach out with a custom product solution for your needs.

INDUSTRIAL CHARTS & PENS

Graphic Controls offers the most comprehensive selection of industrial monitoring supplies world wide. Our circular, strip, and rectangular charts meet or exceed OEM standards for accuracy and performance. We manufacture charts and markers for nearly every instrument on the market.

Industrial Charts & Pens >

TITO SLOT MACHINE TICKETS


Graphic Controls is the #1 global manufacturer of TITO Slot Machine Tickets, supplying tickets to the majority of the worldwide gaming market.

TITO Slot Machine Tickets >

THERMAL TRANSFER RIBBONS


Graphic Controls Thermal Transfer Ribbons are the ideal choice to directly imprint multiple coding options on flexible packaging. Our Thermal Transfer Ribbons offer superior print quality on a broad range of flexible packaging substrates.Exceptional printing quality assures crisp, clear, durable imprints.

Thermal Transfer Ribbons >

TREKTAG® TEMPERATURE DATA LOGGERS


Perishable goods can spoil a supply or distribution channel. For over 60 years, Graphic Controls has provided solutions to record and interpret temperatures, serving the food and beverage, healthcare, chemical, floral and pharmaceutical industries. TrekTag is a family of data logging products giving you quality and peace of mind to ensure your transit and storage environments have been maintained to your standards.

TrekTag Temperature Data Loggers >

PARKING TICKETS, CITATIONS & ACCESSORIES


Graphic Controls offers a complete line of machine issued parking tickets, citations and envelopes, as well as machine cleaning accessories, for all major parking systems. Our products are designed to meet or exceed the OEM specifications and offer complete peace of mind for form, fit and function in your machines.

Parking Tickets, Citations & Accessories >

RECORDER PARTS AND ACCESSORIES


Consolidate your purchasing by sourcing high-quality OEM Recorder Parts from Graphic Controls. As the standard for Charts and Marking systems for over 100 years, we're here to make sure you have access to the parts to keep your recorders at top performance. Whether preventative maintenance, field replaceable parts, or repairs, Graphic Controls stocks many of the parts in strategic warheouses to limit downtime. 

Recorder Parts and Accessories >

GAS INDUSTRY MEASUREMENT


The enormous variety of recording charts made by Graphic Controls includes circular, strip, rectangular and fanfold charts...ink-writing, heat-sensitive, pressure-sensitive and electro-sensitive. These charts are used in instruments that record physical measurements such as temperature, pressure, humidity, flow, liquid level, electric current and voltage...magnetic, seismic and similar information.

Gas Industry Measurement >

WELL LOGGING SUPPLIES


Designed to meet or exceed OEM specifications and deliver manufacturer direct savings. Our well logging product offering is stocked in strategic warehouse locations for same day shipment. Our papers are ensured to be compatible with your printer and backed by our satisfaction guarantee.

Well Logging Paper & Supplies >

Welcome to
Vanguard Companies!

Your partner for turnkey merchandising solutions, award-winning design, pop displays, packaging, and fulfillment services.

Start Your Project

Vanguard Companies is one of the industry’s leading corrugated merchandising solution partners. Our success has been built on great partnerships and an entrepreneurial spirit. We are experts in point-of-purchase displays, signage, retail-ready packaging, industrial packaging, e-commerce packaging, fulfillment services, packing materials and supplies.

This expertise is demonstrated across every retail sector and amplified by our creativity, operational excellence, high-end graphics, digital printing, and program management. We help brands sell more product, foster growth, create brand equity and gain competitive advantage.

Products & Services
From insights to activation, we’ve got you covered.

View Gallery

Retail Merchandising Solutions

As a national merchandising supplier, Vanguard Companies work directly with the world’s largest brands, retailers, and product manufacturers to develop custom award-winning promotional display programs that effectively attract, engage, and sell more products.

Packaging Solutions

Whether retail-ready, industrial, e-commerce or specialty packaging, Vanguard Companies provide a wide range of custom packaging solutions designed to protect, deliver, and promote your brand.

Fulfillment Services

We specialize in the assembly of corrugated displays ranging from simple Sidekicks and PDQs to complex retail pallet displays. We are also experienced in assembling contract packaging programs.

Value-Added Services

Our in-house research and insights team helps companies research, analyze, and present relevant industry insights. Our customized research programs provide reliable and relevant data for strategic business needs and in-store activation.

Our in-house creative services provide the innovation and design expertise to help companies better connect to consumers and shoppers by integrating the art and science of the decision-making process into the design process and activation.

Our dedicated program management services streamline operating procedures to optimize information workflow. We are focused on efficiencies gained to manage projects and executing under tight timelines.

What We Do

For more than 100 years, Appvion has added value to paper by applying a coating to make it more printable. Our R&D programs, industry knowledge, and technical expertise ensure we are the ideal partner for direct thermal and coating applications worldwide. Our direct thermal technology capabilities help our customers keep the world moving ahead, as our products are key solutions for so many tickets, tags, labels, and packages that consumers touch daily.

View Our Capabilities
What Sustainability Means to Us
Sustainability is a core component of our strategy, and Create a Better Tomorrow is our commitment to creating positive change — for our planet, our communities, our families, and every living thing on the planet. It takes more than science and technology to transition to a better world: it also requires people who care about each other, the environment, the future, and their actions. 
Quite simply, we aim to use our chemistry and manufacturing expertise to contribute to a prosperous society, and our framework prioritizes three themes that enable Appvion to deliver on its commitments. Together, we can push the boundaries for a better tomorrow.
Work Smarter

We have a responsibility to use as few resources as efficiently as possible.


Act Responsibly

Acting responsibly is a cornerstone of our culture and critical to our success.

Optimize Design

We take every opportunity to reduce waste and use more renewable materials.

Learn More About Our Sustainability Practices
Our Products
Appvion innovates direct thermal and specialty coating solutions that serve a wide range of markets such as retail, healthcare, transportation, entertainment, and food packaging. Headquartered in Appleton, Wisconsin, we are the market leader of direct thermal paper and direct thermal film products in North America, and we’re a world-class leader in renewable, fiber-based consumer and industrial packaging solutions. We have a broad range of water-based coatings and application technologies to meet everyday product performance requirements.
View Our Products
Appvion Insights

Our blog and media insights allow us to interact with you and inform you about the happenings at Appvion. We hope you find our newsroom to be a valuable resource for information regarding our latest innovations, recent company news, community involvement, and interesting stories from Team Appvion. 

This is Appvion
The courage to pioneer, the ingenuity to devise and adapt, the tenacity to persevere – these qualities of the human spirit are invariably embedded into the matrix of our organization. Our success comes from rolling up our sleeves as an extension of your team to ensure everyday business runs smoothly and efficiently. We’re a committed partner who innovates with you, creating solutions for a profitable, sustainable future.

Sustainability. It’s In Our Fiber.

At ProCon, we continue to invest in new technologies and we’re proud to introduce Vireo, a natural addition to our portfolio of services. All Vireo coatings are PFAS-Free, FDA certified, suitable for use as a barrier coating agent and can be tailored to meet your needs for sustainable products. ProCon has the ability to provide renewable, repulpable, recyclable solutions for your sustainable packaging needs.

Sustainable Coatings 
Vireo Coatings

Eliminate plastic in your packaging with Vireo Coatings, high-performance barrier coatings for paper-based packaging that are earth friendly, poly free, and more than 99 percent reusable.

Paper Converting

Transform paper and other substrates into custom sizes that meet your finished products specifications from sheeting and rewinding to cartoning, ream wrapping, and more.

Paper Sales

Improve your operations and business’s bottom line with our wide range of mill-guaranteed paper products for printing and packaging that ensure the highest quality and consistency.

Supply Chain Solutions

Streamline shipments with a one-stop-shop for all your distribution needs and reliable supply chain solutions and support, including freight consolidation, rail access and distribution, and next-day delivery.

Our Services 
The premier converting & logistics partner since 1991

Progressive Converting (ProCon) was founded in 1991 by an entrepreneurial group of printing professionals who shared a profound understanding of paper, printing and the demands of mills. Their goal was to provide high-quality converting services to merchants, commercial printers and paper mills.

Today, ProCon is the largest independent paper converter by market share in the United States and the premier converting & logistics partner for the North American Paper Industry. With multiple locations and distribution throughout the nation, our results can be attributed to our focus on exceeding our clients’ expectations and inspiring our employees.

We see the big picture and the future

We bring small town values of practicality, thriftiness, and doing the right thing to global business operations. Upholding our commitment to the environment, we align with standards set by organizations like FSC®, SFI®, and PEFC. We are a market leader that prides itself on being responsible and accountable through sustainability initiatives.

Commitment to Sustainability 
We are one of few firms to achieve three prestigious certifications: FSC®, SFI® & PEFC
With six locations, it's no wonder we're fast & efficient

ProCon is closer to your customers and faster to your markets. Each of our six locations across the country offers comprehensive paper converting, warehousing and distribution services under one roof, allowing us to serve as an extension of your finishing and logistics operations for standard and custom sizes, and delivering your products to any U.S. market quickly and efficiently.

Carbon Capture

Our products are generated under our Circular Economy model: Urban Forest®

It is a production model that allows our products to comply with a 360° life cycle, meaning all our products are produced 100% with recycled material. That is why it is known as the Circular Economy. It allows each product, upon completing its life cycle, to be collected and processed for the production of new and high-quality paper and paper derivatives.

Signage & Photo

Advertising messages with a wow effect, your personal favorite photo or high quality art prints need the right print media to be perfectly staged. With products from Sihl, you can achieve unforgettable moments for the viewer.

Label & Tags

We encounter labels and tags every day, on bottles, clothing, food, plants, or at the airport. Whether tear-resistant, waterproof, or PVC-free, you will find the right products for your application in our FACESTOCK, PRESSURETAC, PICOFILM and ENDURO ranges - even for very short runs of personalised labels or tags.

Packaging

A food for your darling, your power bar after doing a sport or your favorite hand cream - ARTYSIO is the revolutionary solution for digitally printed packaging films with water - based inkjet technology. Our innovative products make it possible to produce flexible, individualised, food-compliant packaging according to your needs as quickly as possible.

Surface Decoration

With us the world revolves around YOU! Individualization is the topic of our time and is becoming more and more important in all areas of life. Shoes, backpack buckles, helmets and kitchen cupboards are just the beginning of a great variety that can be individually designed with our films and innovative technology for 3D sublimation.

Commercial Printing

Commercial printing solutions are for people who value accuracy and consistency when it comes to their prints. Whether it is a digital reproduction or CAD drawing, something in either color or black and white, Sihl has the solution.
