KYD IS NOW PFAS FREE!

KYD is proud to announce that we have successfully transitioned to a PFAS-free production process. PFAS, which stands for per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances, are a group of chemicals that have been linked to various health and environmental risks. By removing PFAS from our products, we demonstrate our commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction. This transition will improve our products' quality and safety while reducing environmental impact. We appreciate your continued support and trust in reducing our environmental impact. 




At KYD Inc., we are passionate about protecting the environment in Hawaii. Our commitment to preserving the environment goes beyond recycling or using eco-friendly products. It also involves using resources wisely, minimizing waste, and being committed to reducing, recycling, repurposing, and reusing. 

Read more

Our Honolulu manufacturing plant is a prime example of our dedication to the environment. We use photovoltaic systems that generate electricity, reducing our reliance on non-renewable energy sources. Our inventory includes many eco-friendly, sustainable, and compliant products, such as leak-proof, disposable, biodegradable, reusable containers, bags, chemicals, food service ware, paper towels, tissues, napkins, and more. We even collaborate with other manufacturers to create innovative items using cutting-edge materials. 




As a leading player in the packaging industry, we take our responsibility to the environment seriously. We deliver superior products that meet and exceed environmentally responsible standards by leveraging our expertise, knowledge, and strength. Our environmentally friendly products protect the planet, and our goal is to empower our customers to minimize their carbon footprint.




Join us in our mission to achieve sustainability goals and create a cleaner, greener world for future generations. By partnering with KYD Inc., you can be confident that you are getting superior products that are both cost-effective and environmentally responsible.

Simplified Supply Chain

Robust inventory with 500+ different materials. Over 20 million yards of globally sourced nonwovens in stock. Midwest Filtration offers customized release quantities to align deliveries with your operations. Our lead time is as short as one week.

Midwest Filtration helps customers gain access, reduce order quantities and lead times, lower inventory carrying costs, and mitigate supply chain disruptions.

Best-in-Class Converting

Based out of a 180,000 ft2 facility in Ohio, with our primary focuses on filtration and adjacent industries, we specialize in precision slitting, high-speed die cutting, sheeting, sewing, heat sealing, welding, printing & assembly as well as custom solutions.

Our converting capabilities cover a wide range of material types, roll sizes, product dimensions, tight tolerances as well as industry leading speed and quality.

Comprehensive Solutions

Comprehensive knowledge and expertise of products and applications. Offering Spunbond, Meltblown, SMS, Spunlaced, Airlaid, Wetlaid, Needle Punch, Stitch Bond, Nanofiber, Microglass, and other nonwoven technologies.

About BWF Profiles
The BWF Group introduces itself:
International Technology Leader for Industrial Filters, Wool Felt, Technical Needle Felt and Plastic Profiles

Regionally Based World Leaders. As a leading manufacturer in the field of textile filter media, technical needle felts, wool felts and high-quality plastic products, we are deeply rooted in the location of our headquarters in Offingen, Bavaria, and at the same time, we are active worldwide with a total of 1,800 employees at 16 production sites in eleven countries. The headquarters of the BWF Group and its divisions BWF Envirotec, BWF Feltec and BWF Profiles are located in Offingen (Bavaria). BWF Protec, the fourth division of the BWF Group, is based in in the Bavarian town of Hof.

production sites
worldwide
employees
in total
divisions
independent
The largest German family business in the fields of industrial filters, technical felt, wool felt and plastic profiles


The BWF Group is an owner-managed family business in its fifth generation. For us, consistency and renewal as well as tradition and modernity are values that go hand in hand. We set international standards through innovation, competence and commitment. Worldwide, we are available for our customers at 16 production sites and numerous sales locations. Our product portfolio is divided into four divisions: BWF Envirotec with industrial filters, BWF Protec with technical felts, BWF Feltec with wool felts and BWF Profiles with plastic profiles.

Industrial filters for manufacturing industries: Innovative filters and services for controlling air pollution


We Care for Clean Air. As the motto of our BWF Envirotec division says, clean air is our passion. The sustainable reduction of air pollution is our core task. Mindful of our ecological responsibility, we develop, produce and market our BWF Envirotec products and solutions for industrial filtration. Worldwide, our industrial filters ensure the lowest possible emissions, reduce particle pollution and filter fine dust and absorbed harmful gases in the process.

Technical felts for industry in best quality and processing


Innovative product developments and needle felts of the most superior quality are available from BWF Protec in Hof an der Saale. Whether high-quality needle felts for technical applications in the industrial sector or high-tech needle felts for fire protection or protective treatment, e.g. for occupational safety - BWF Protec products have become indispensable products in all these areas. We do not merely focus on the production of yard goods, but also produce endless needled rollers and belts as well as ready-made parts for you.

Individual solutions at the highest level of quality have always been our goal. 125 years are just the beginning!

Maximilian Offermann
Managing Partner BWF Group
Wool felt yard goods with the best wool felt properties for large industry applications and further processing


BWF Feltec offers you an unrivalled product variety with colour and design felts, undercollar felts, acoustic products of the brand silentec® by BWF Group or with technical felts as well as function-enhancing finishing options for wool felt and needle felt. As a manufacturer, we possess the necessary expertise and long-standing experience, making us an excellent partner for you, especially when it comes to customised developments. BWF Feltec products environmentally safe all the way from production to disposal and the raw materials we use, sheep's wool and viscose, are bio-degradable.

Plastic profiles, tubes and sheets for industry and trade


BWF Profiles is the market leader in the extrusion of high-quality thermoplastics. We have been providing our customers with competent support in the development and production of plastic profiles, plastic tubes and plastic sheets as well as optical foils, for over 65 years. The BWF Profiles product range is rounded off by high-quality thermoformed and injection moulded parts from our subsidiary BWF Thermoforms in Geretsried (Bavaria). We provide your plastic profile with the ideal form and function as well as the right material for your application!

Our People

At Accord Carton, we understand that the quality of our cartons directly impact your job and the success of your organization. With decades of experience and training, let us help you by providing packaging that performs, backed by people who care.

Our Passion

Our story is one of 70+ years of commitment to helping clients create great packaging that sells. 

Click here to learn about our passion. >

Welcome to Accord Carton

Folding cartons aren’t just containers. Your product’s presentation on the shelf gives consumers a glimpse of who you are and the story you want to tell. And to create great packaging you need more than a supplier; you need a partner. Accord Carton has the tools to help you bring your vision to life.

Since 1940 our goal has been to produce the best packaging possible. Using state-of-the-art technology combined with a passion for our work, we partner with customers in a range of industries, creating packaging that truly showcases their products.

What really sets us apart is something no one else has: our people, our process and our passion. As you browse through our site, you can learn more about each of these unique aspects of Accord Carton, and how they will shape our relationship.

Accord Carton offers customers a true partnership for every aspect of the manufacturing process, from design to production to delivering quality finished cartons. Whatever your folding carton needs are, we’re here to help you every step of the way.

Moving Flexible Packaging Forward

By redefining innovation through collaboration within our own company and with our customers and suppliers.

Transparent Film Used in Flexible Packaging

GL FILM is a transparent barrier film with the world’s highest level barrier performance, developed using TOPPAN’s original coating and vapor deposition technologies.

Read More 

GL FILM Applications

GL FILM's high barrier performance protects contents from moisture, oxygen, and drying. It also provides a range of added value. GL FILM can be used to replace aluminum foil, and its transparency enables contents to be visible, thus enhancing their appeal to customers. Packages using GL FILM can also be heated in microwave ovens and inspected using metal detectors.

Read More

Corrugated Box Manufacturers

Quality, Integrity and Reliability. At Bell Container these words are our ideals, our standard of excellence. Bell has provided superior corrugated boxes since 1919. Delivery by our professional fleet is made on time, every time. We reside on 9 acres and have a 200,000 sq. ft. facility conveniently located in Newark, New Jersey.

We manufacture custom corrugated containers for all of your shipping and packaging needs.

The dedicated employees will exceed your goals and needs from the custom box design, created and developed by our experienced designers on computerized CAD/CAM equipment, to the production run manufactured on our modern high speed corrugator and finishing equipment.

To meet the requests of our customers, Bell Container is ISO 9001-2015 Certified (a quality management system), as well as SFI CoC Certified. Bell Container is also audited GMP approved.

Equipment

Bell Container has an equipment list that ensures diverse capabilities that will allow us to meet your every product need for custom corrugated boxes.

CORRUGATOR
98” State of the Art Corrugator
B, C, and T flutes as well as a variety of combinations of Doublewall materials

PRESSES
50×113 – 3 Color with Attachment Capabilities

DIE-CUTTERS
(2) Rotary 2 Color 66×113
(1) Rotary 3 Color 66×135
(1) Rotary 5 Color 66×113

FLEXO FOLDER/GLUERS
Bell Container operates a total of 10 Flexo Folder/Gluers with 1 to 4 color print capabilities as well as inline die cutting capabilities

OTHERS
Bandsaw
Slitter
Stitcher
Taper
POST Specialty Folder/Gluer 115

Our Team

Bell Container has a team of knowledgable Sales Representatives at your disposal and an in-house Sales and Service Department that can be trusted to respond to all your corrugated box requirements with immediate and professional assistance.

Location

Bell Container is conveniently located in Newark, NJ. We are accessible from all major highways; New Jersey Turnpike, Garden State Parkway, Interstates 280, 78, 80 and Routes 1, 9, 21, 3, 17 and 46. Our prime box shipping location allows us easy access up and down the Northeast corridor from New York City to South Jersey, including upstate New York and Eastern Pennsylvania.

Bell Container services the tri-state area with our own fleet of thirty-six (36) tractors, three (3) straight trucks and three-hundred fifty (350) trailers. Bell Container has maintenance on site to properly maintain this equipment to keep it on the road in order to service our customers. Bell Container maintains strategic shipping alliances allowing us to reach other areas of the country.

Keene Building Products develops and manufactures high-performance, cost-effective solutions that enhance the longevity and efficiency of buildings. From roof to foundation, we produce innovative, code-compliant products that are easy to install and meet the demands of modern construction.

FEATURED PRODUCTS
The latest and greatest of Keene’s products — engineered to meet the exacting demands of modern construction, ensuring exceptional durability, efficiency, and code compliance.
Driwall™ Rainscreen

Keene’s Driwall™ Rainscreen products are engineered with precision to elevate the durability and performance of stucco and thin-stone veneers. Available in varying thicknesses—from 0.13″ (013-1) for standard applications, to 0.4″ (020-1 and 10mm) for enhanced moisture management, and a UV-resistant option for direct exposure—these rainscreens create a critical gap, facilitating continuous airflow and effective moisture evacuation.

Driwall™ LathNet®

Driwall™ LathNet combines galvanized metal lath with a polyethylene drainage mesh, providing a two-in-one solution that simplifies the installation process for stucco and thin-stone veneer systems.

Easy-Fur™

Easy-Fur™ is a rollable furring strip that simplifies installation for wood, vinyl, and metal siding, ensuring a consistent cavity space for drainage and ventilation behind cladding. Designed to replace wood furring strips, this product prevents moisture buildup, mold growth, and material decay.

MortarNet® Ultra

MortarNet® Ultra suspends mortar droppings above the flashing and weeps, so they stay clear and unobstructed. The patented dual layers help provide compressibility within inconsistent cavity widths, while maintaining the drainage and ventilation you can expect from a MortarNet product.

Printing Technologies
Lithographic

Ideal for larger run jobs on film, paper and metalized paper.

Flexographic

Capabilities to print on just about any substrate including sleeve and lid films, pressure sensitive and paper stocks. We offer in-line back printing, die-cutting, laminating, and cold-foil stamping.

Committed to You!

Pathfinder Services is dedicated to helping those in need along life’s journey.

Pathfinder Services supports people through education, training, community integration, housing, homeownership programs, and employment services. Our goal is for everyone we serve to feel a state of well-being grounded in a philosophy of self-reliance and integration into the communities in which they choose to live.

WHO WE ARE
DONATE
OUR SERVICES
Find the services that are right for you!
Children

Kids Kampus is an integrated facility for children of all abilities in the same learning space with part-time and full-time traditional childcare and an Early Head Start program at no cost to low-income and foster families.

Children
Teens & Adults

Community Supports offers supported independent living, group home living, community integration, day services, and structured family caregiving. Resource Connection assists in finding and retaining meaningful employment.

Teens & Adults
HomeOwnership

The HomeOwnership Center helps people realize their dream of homeownership from building and restoring credit to buying and closing on a home. We offer money management workshops, first-time homebuyer programs, responsible loan options, and homebuyer education.

EXPERIENCED. CUSTOMER FOCUSED. RELIABLE.

What Does Your Situation Require?

Customer Applications Drive Us. Lamart is a wide web, custom coater and laminator of flexible substrates, such as films, scrims, foils, foams, fabrics, and much more! We provide solutions for the most unique and challenging of substrates to work with.

If you’ve been told by another company that your project is too technical to complete, we’re here to help. We specialize in custom adhesive solutions for the most unique and challenging substrates.

Application & Customers

Our focus remains centered on providing fast, high-quality solutions to our customers. We ensure that our products are pre-qualified, engineering support is only a phone call away, and that our solutions are ultimately customized with our customers and their applications in mind.

Manufacturing & Quality

Our experienced operations staff produces material traceability, efficient techniques, ensured product quality and we continue to optimize our manufacturing process to maximize operational efficiency and the highest product quality possible.

Experienced Scientists & Engineers

The prototypes that our team of expert material scientists and engineers produce are of the highest quality. We conduct pre-production trials, product testing, and verification. Investing in our science-minded experts is at the top of our priority list. We know that if our people are happy, then the work they produce will always be of the highest caliber.

BOCS Technology

Reinforced Kapton & Mylar space films have been specially developed to meet the space industry’s need for strong, lightweight films.

Insulation Products

We provide bulk roll insulation’s fabricated per OEM specifications for Lockheed C.130 and C-5 aircraft. Boeing CH-47, Bell UH-1 and other U.S. military platforms. Lamart California’s Orcotek ® Strip Blanket is a time saving and cost efficient product that airline maintenance crews and MRO bases use as a replacement.

Battery Carbon Coating

At Lamart, we harness our expertise to enhance the future of energy storage with our advanced carbon-coating services for lithium-ion batteries.

Unique Custom Coating And Lamination Solutions

PERFORMANCE

Tape For Any Job

To build the perfect adhesive product for any application, we implement next-level coating and converting from our AS 9100 and IS 9001 certified facilities.

EXPERTISE

Answers To Your Challenges

Lamart's development team includes chemists, technicians and a process development group, supported by our experienced quality assurance and materials procurement departments. This team works together to find existing material sources or to develop entirely new materials, then develop processes to make unique flexible products. Minor to major processing equipment modifications have been made to meet our customers' evolving product needs.

DISCOVER OUR SERVICES

Over the years, we have developed a customer-centric approach to adhesive tapes for both standard and custom products.

WHO WE ARE
Mission Statement

The R. Sabee Company is committed to improving the lives of employees, partners and consumers by producing superior quality absorbent products embracing innovation and delivering exceptional customer care.

WHAT WE BELIEVE
Vision Statement

Our vision is to be a world-class manufacturer setting the standard for pet, home and medical absorbent products.

Who We Are

Since 1951, the R. Sabee Company has been a leader in the converting and absorbent pad industry.  The R. Sabee Company is a fast-growing company that is committed to building a team environment by improving the lives of their employees, suppliers, and customers alike. 

​

R. Sabee Company sets itself apart from other companies by its commitment and drive for engineering and manufacturing excellence.  Leveraging decades of experience, agility, and global relationships, our teams come together to produce the highest quality pet, home and medical absorbent products, utilized by millions. With each new partnership and each new product, our visionary team is committed to delivering world-class solutions, every step of the way.

​

As the R. Sabee Company continues to grow, we will leverage our founding principles of ingenuity and integrity to guide every new team member and new partnership in the years ahead.

WELCOME TO TVS, the largest private manufacturing employer in Transylvania County, North Carolina. What we make matters — to those who make it and to those who depend on it.

For over 50 years, we’ve been serving people with disabilities and other life barriers. Fueled by our quality-focused manufacturing and long-term U.S. Government contracts, TVS is able to provide meaningful employment and support services for people of all abilities. As we continue to grow, we’re always looking for new people to join the TVS family, including those looking for meaningful employment as well as those who could benefit from our support services.

Convenient, Single-Source Precision Manufacturing with Global Reach

For over fifty years, companies of all sizes have selected PLITEK® for our engineering expertise, high volume precision manufacturing capacity, and quality of service. Our vertically integrated capabilities can save you time and cost. Whether your requirement is 500 or 5,000,000 pieces, our state-of-the-art converting equipment offers notable capabilities.

Our vertically integrated business model has been designed to allow our customers the convenience of a streamlined manufacturing process along with process control and efficient timeline. We offer the ability and resources to begin our business relationship with small runs for prototype development, feasibility studies, and process validation to full-scale manufacturing. We can provide guidance with material selection and optimization to bring your idea to efficient full-scale manufacturing.  

Combination of engineering expertise, materials science, prototyping capabilities, ISO Class 8 clean rooms, and vertically integrated manufacturing allow us to provide innovative solutions for even the most complex converting requirements. 

Our US-based manufacturing and design operations are located near Chicago, a top logistics and manufacturing hub. Our reach is global, serving businesses in regional markets to companies with multinational supply chains.

View All Services

Package Degassing System

Reliable, cost-effective and environmentally-friendly one-way degassing valves and vents for a wide range of product packaging applications including coffee, pet food, vitamins, fruits and vegetables, products with yeast, and other products requiring head space gas evacuation from sealed packaging. PLI-VALV® one-way degassing valves enable head-space gases from inside of sealed packaging to escape while providing an effective barrier to environmental oxygen, moisture, and contamination keeping products fresh. 

LEARN MORE
Custom Film Extrusion

PLITEK® specializes in extruding custom films in an ISO Class 8 clean room. We have the ability to extrude smaller startup quantities supporting our customers from a design and development phase, through high volume production and commercialization. Custom films can be provided in roll form, sheet form, or as precision die cut components tailored to meet specific application requirements.

As part of our continual vertical integration, we are in the process of adding new extruding capabilities: co-extrusion and polypropylene meltblown filter media extrusion.

LEARN MORE
PLI-TAB® hang tabs and display strips are manufactured from premium material under strict quality control for strong, self-adhering tabs to securely attach to a range of items.
Hang Tabs & Display Strips

High-quality hang tabs and display strips display products at eye-level that help increase sales. We stock a wide variety of PLI-TAB® hang tabs, wobblers and vertical display strips.

What is Foampack Puerto Rico?

Foam Pack, Inc. has been a prominent player in the packaging industry in the Caribbean since January 1981. Our diverse product lines include industrial, corrugated, thermo-foam, protective, and specialized packaging, as well as cold chain, co-packaging, and other packaging solutions. Situated conveniently off state highway #1 in Rio Piedras, Puerto Rico, our modern facilities span over 100,000 square feet.

We thrive to Excel

As an ISO 9001 certified facility, we offer CAD/EC design support and subassembly expertise. In addition to our packaging solutions, we have ventured into the construction industry by introducing LiteDeck®, a sustainable and cost-effective alternative for insulating and safeguarding residential and commercial structures that align with the U.S. Federal LEED program.

Our Principles?

Our core principle revolves around continuously seeking innovative and cost-efficient methods to transform materials into top-quality packaging products that meet our customers’ expectations. Allow us to leverage our experience and technical knowledge to address all your packaging requirements effectively.

FoamPack’s core manufacturing division is packaging. We mainly provide cardboard products -including cushion or corrugated packaging materials- and their personalised designs.

FoamPack’s second manufacturing division is foam. We have a wide range of foam materials -including polyurethane foam and EPS (expanded polystyrene)- with personalised mouldes for your business.

Contract Packaging including all types of folding carton, inserts (Corrugated, Polyurethane, Pelyethylene, Folding or EPS Choices) 

LITE DECK is great for construction because it is lightweight and easy to move. Also, it has insulation properties that make your building eco-friendly and energy efficient!

Our Team is the Best

We prioritize professionalism and commitment in everything we do. Foam Pack, Inc. specializes in providing premium packaging solutions to meet your needs. Our team of 100 dedicated employees ensures that every product is handled with care and expertise. As a Puerto Rican-owned business, we are committed to excellence and customer satisfaction in all our endeavors.

Our focus on professionalism and dedication sets us apart in the industry. We strive to deliver top-notch packaging solutions tailored to your specific requirements. We are always open to new projects and ways to use our materials. If you are looking for an alternative and innovative way to improve your business solutions or products, we are here to help.

Mision
Manufacture protective packaging according to customer specifications, focusing on quality and cost-effective practices to ensure excellent efficiency in each delivery.

About PRMA

The Puerto Rico Manufacturers Association is a private, voluntary, non-profit organization established in 1928 with the purpose of uniting all Puerto Rico’s manufacturers and service industries into a strong and effective body in order to further their mutual interests as they relate to the private and public sectors of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

ENVELOPES LIKE NOBODY ELSE®
PAPERCONE PRODUCTS
Shop Tyvek®

Envelopes made with DuPont™ Tyvek® are the most recognizable, durable envelopes on the planet. Tyvek® envelopes stand out when mailing or storing documents.

Shop Fibercraft® EF

FiberCraft® EF provides an environmentally friendly, durable envelope solution. FiberCraft® EF envelopes are made from 76% recycled paper and 68% post consumer content.

Shop Paper

Our inventory of paper envelopes includes a wide variety of options. Expansion envelopes help save on shipping costs by reducing weight & dimension of your package.

Shop Herculink®

Envelopes made with Herculink® are both distinctive and durable. The integrated weave pattern and moisture resistant coating make Herculink® an affordable alternative.

Shop Tri-Brite®

Envelopes made with durable Tri-Brite® give the appearance of a a high end paper envelope. Tri-Brite® envelopes are the perfect option when printing is as important as durability.

Shop Terraboard™

Papercone’s newest product, TerraBoard™, has a wide variety of eco-friendly features that make it the best choice for businesses looking to shrink their carbon footprint.

Tear Resistant

Papercone envelopes are made of tear resistant materials that can withstand the toughest handling.

Security Risk Compliant

Send confidential documents through the mail with confidence that your contents won’t be tampered with. 

Water Resistant

Your packages will be sure to stay dry when you use Papercone’s water and weather resistant envelopes.

Specialty

At Papercone, we can deliver plain envelopes or full-color envelopes depending on your customer’s needs.

and Achieve the Highest Rating of Food Safety in the Industry

Let’s Build a Great Package Together

Every now and again we like to craft and release videos to show what Portco is all about and to punctuate what we can do for your brand and product line. This latest video features Portco’s President and CEO, Kent Wall, the 3rd generation leader of the company that was started by his grandfather almost 90 years ago. Kent talks about what is at the core of the company, how innovative and responsive it can and has to be in this continually changing world. Let’s start a conversation.

Packaging with Peace of Mind

We are a 3rd generation family run company. We strive to make the highest quality, safest packaging in the most responsible way – for brands, we’re really passionate about. We have a wide range of fiercely loyal clients because we stand behind every package we sell. One of the first west coast packaging companies to earn the highest level of SQF, the highest rating for food safety in our industry. We make multi-wall bags, stand-up pouches, and printed roll stock. We view our packaging as another ingredient – protecting your fresh, frozen, dry, and wet goods with the same standards of food safety as you do.

Our plants are located on each side of Mt. Adams in the state of Washington. Our packaging appears on store aisles from Milwaukie to Melbourne.

Associations and Certifications

As we strive to maintain the highest level of safety and compliance in the flexible packaging industry, we are active members in several associations and the recipient of several important certifications that ensure safety and quality. Click here to explore. 

Sustainability Options

When it comes to packaging, consumers continue to demand more sustainable options and regulations continue to change. This trend will continue to influence buying decisions when choosing a product on the store shelf or e-commerce space.  To address these demands and support your brand, Portco Packaging™ has developed the EarthGuard™ line of options to address your company’s individual needs regarding sustainability. The EarthGuard™ line offers PCR Solutions, Recycle Ready, Compostable, and Bio-assimilated options. Explore EarthGuard here.

 

What does a packaging mistake cost?

A mistake or contamination in our industry costs way more than just a reprint of packaging – in ingredients, processing, time, delivery delays and retailer confidence.  One broken link in the food chain affects all others. So it was an easy decision to obtain the highest level of certification a food packaging can achieve with SQF. That’s peace of mind with your product and reputation on the line. It also reflects something else: we sweat the details. There’s a reason we’ve studied all pages of the SQF Food Safety Code for Manufacturing of Food Packaging and the SQF Quality Code…so you don’t have to. 

SQF is recognized by retailers and food service providers around the world who require a rigorous, credible food safety management system.

Relentless Pursuit of a Better Way

At Portco, it's our mission to make the highest quality, safest flexible packaging in the most responsible way. We'll be the first to explore the way - ensuring the journey is safe and easy to follow.

ST. JOHNS PACKAGING

Founded in 1954 by René J. Leclair, St. Johns Packaging is a vertically integrated manufacturer of flexible packaging products that are sold to leading food and consumer product companies. Still controlled by the Leclair family, the company currently operates wholly-owned subsidiaries in Canada, the United States, Mexico, the United Kingdom, China, Vietnam and Australia, employing more than 950 dedicated employees.

In 2009, St. Johns Packaging acquired North State Flexibles. This facility focuses on flexographic printing up to 10 colors, solvent-less lamination, manufacturing of wicket bags, laminated material and pouches.

Ilkeston

About Colbert Packaging

Colbert Packaging is a dynamic high volume producer of sustainable paper-based packaging, serving the pharmaceutical, healthcare and consumer goods industries. We produce offset and flexographic printed folding cartons, formed paper trays, pressure-sensitive roll labels and informational package inserts. Our in-house services include structural design, full-service prepress, paperboard sheeting, ink blending/matching and die making/cutting.

We’ll work with you to design earth-friendly, secondary packaging solutions that satisfy today’s sustainability requirements. Everything from right-sizing materials to 100% inline vision inspection for fully integrated quality control, sets you on a course to The Total Package. Add to the equation fully recyclable paperboard, along with water- and agri-based inks, coatings and adhesives, and you’ll have The Total Package in One Clean Carton®!

Is product tampering or counterfeiting a concern? We offer a complete array of overt and covert security features designed to guard against fraud risks. Take a few minutes to learn more about our Anti-Counterfeit Solutions.

Better, Every Day

Paperboard packaging is a tangible way we help leave the world a better place for future generations. But there’s a lot more to it than that.

How we’re leading the charge
PaperSeal™ Saves the Tray

PaperSeal™ offers brands and retailers the opportunity to replace high-barrier, Modified Atmosphere Packaging (MAP) plastic trays with a barrier-lined paperboard alternative. 

Go Bold with Boardio™

With its eye-catching shape and design, Boardio™ is our latest system innovation—a rigid paperboard canister with high fiber content.

Goodbye Plastic Rings, Hello KeelClip™

KeelClip™ is a paperboard clip-style multipack solution that replaces plastic rings and shrink film. It provides an enhanced user experience, great merchandising appeal, and has an integrated high-speed machinery solution.

VISTA PACKAGING AND LOGISTICS
INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS THAT EXCEED YOUR EXPECTATIONS.

At Vista Packaging & Logistics we take pride in being your one-stop, turnkey partner for contract packaging and logistics. Tailoring our services to customers of all sizes and across diverse industries, we cater to a broad spectrum of specialized needs.

Our Offerings:

Turnkey Solutions: We provide end-to-end solutions that encompass every aspect of contract packaging and logistics. From concept to delivery, we streamline the entire process for your convenience.

Industry-agnostic Approach: Regardless of your industry, we have the expertise to meet your unique requirements. Our versatility allows us to serve clients in various sectors with precision and efficiency.

Cost Reduction Strategies: Our goal is to reduce your costs effectively. Through innovative solutions and strategic approaches, we optimize processes to ensure efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

Labor-Intensive Relief: Say goodbye to labor-intensive responsibilities. We handle the intricacies of packaging and logistics, allowing you to focus on your core business activities.

Positive Bottom-Line Impact: Our solutions are designed not just to meet but to positively impact your bottom line. We aim to enhance your operational efficiency and contribute to your overall business success.

Choose us for a partnership that goes beyond traditional packaging and logistics. Experience the ease of a one-stop solution provider that understands your unique needs and delivers results that matter. Let us be the catalyst for your success in the competitive landscape.

What Our Customers Are Saying
“Unparalleled Attention to Detail”
Ann L., Dix & Eaton

The book looks fantastic! It’s always a great experience working with everyone at Oliver. The press OK went perfectly, and I was able to get some work done while waiting in between OKs. It was great catching up with Dan while I was there. His attention to detail is unparalleled. I know I’m in great hands, and that’s especially important in this quick-turn, fast-moving environment. Thanks for delivering a high-quality print piece on time and on budget. You’re making me look good!

"Couldn't ask for a better partner"
Andrea Gobeli, Creative Systems & Sourcing, Americas, Kao Corporation

I wanted to share with you a testimonial about Oliver. We’ve been working with Oliver for several years and they continue to impress us with their professional, hands-on approach to packaging solutions. They offer solution-based concepts that keep our products intact with very competitive pricing and quick turnaround. Everyone that we work with, from package engineering to design and final production, has contributed to our success with every project and we couldn’t ask for a better partner for bringing our promotions to life!

Eric Capers, Creative Director Barbara Laudisi Martens, Princeton Tec

Lana K., Founder, Deluxe Photo

I’ve been on the fast-track growing my start-up event photography business across the country and I couldn’t have done it without the support and quality photo folders from Oliver. Ryan Day, Founder and Owner, Inhale Exhale

Working with Oliver and their engineers was fantastic. Ashley Zager, VP of Operations, The New Primal

We have greatly appreciated working with Oliver. From service to turnaround time to accountability – everything is top-notch. Having trusted partners helps me sleep at night.

Jim Dygas, Co-Founder, Urban Accents

Oliver over-delivers all the time. We have made our name in the business through being creative and being nimble – Oliver is the exact same way.

Tracy Claros, Founder, Sticky Toffee Pudding Company

I appreciate that as my business continues to grow, Oliver is able to keep up with our large-scale quantities. Oliver has effortlessly scaled up packaging production runs, without losing the friendliness and agility that drew me to them in the first place.

Jill M., The Invisible Chef

They are fast, continuous, precise, friendly and fun to work with...and they are excellent on color match! Corrugated Materials with a Conscience
Sustainable Corrugated Produces Corrugated Sheets with a Conscience

With our state-of-the-art corrugators, we make the highest quality board using 100% recycled papers from industry-innovator Jackson Paper Manufacturing, and Kraftliner from our trusted industry partners. Our materials and processes promote a cleaner environment and smaller manufacturing carbon footprint.

Relationships Are Important to Us

Owners, managers, and employees of sheet plants need an independent sheet feeder who is a trusted supplier and partner that understands their business. Sustainable Corrugated is 100% committed to the success of our sheet plant customers. Our customers experience best-of-class customer service. EDI technology enables Sustainable Corrugated to receive orders and send confirmations and delivery receipts electronically. Our partners can seamlessly manage and track their supply chain from order to receipt.

Why Our Customers
Are Loyal

We have repeat customers because we share their values of quality, reliability, and responsiveness. Our product standards meet or exceed TAPPI guidelines, and you can rely on the lead times provided by Sustainable Corrugated’s exceptional and dedicated customer service representatives. Through a commitment to innovation, we continuously improve our processes and products so you’ll always receive the very best corrugated sheets in the industry.

Innovative and Reliable Label Solutions

Our distributors offer more than just an expansive selection of label products. We provide innovative solutions to help make your business more productive and your life more organized.

Our products are manufactured for strength and durability to ensure they operate smoothly whether you’re printing labels at home or on a commercial printing press

Customization to Meet Your Brand Needs

Our distributors know your label needs are not always ‘cut-and dry’. We can also print, manufacture and package custom labels according to your unique specifications.

Your labels are an extension of your business branding and should reflect the sophistication and success that defines your company. Our distributors understand this, which is why we offer the ultimate in label and card customization services.

Committed to You
Every Step

Our distributors offer years of expertise and vast knowledge of label technologies to help you find the right answers to best fit your needs with an unparalleled level of customer support.

We continue to bring exciting new products to help make everyday life run a little more smoothly. No matter what advances the future may bring, we’ll be there for you every step of the way.

Innovative & Custom Label Solutions
Learn More >

Custom Labeling Consultation

Creating your custom labeling solution begins with our solutions sales consultants. It takes more than a sales pitch to ensure a properly engineered label. Our goal is to see and understand what our competition may overlook. Once we have properly evaluated your process, including material requirements, application and performance expectations; your account is handled personally by a dedicated account manager. All relevant details concerning your custom label are recorded in a master specification to drive your order through our manufacturing process.

Learn More >

 

UL, cUL and CSA Labels

Advanced Labelworx, Inc. has a team of experts that can assist you with all of your UL/cUL, CSA and other compliance labeling needs. We maintain numerous listings under both UL/cUL and CSA.

Learn More >

Commitment to Quality

All of our facilities are ISO certified. We have extensive knowledge of APQP (Advanced Product Quality Planning), PPAP’s (Production Part Approval Process), FAIR’s (First Article Inspection Report), PSW (Part Submission Warrant), etc. ALI’s continual improvement philosophy positions us as a leader in our industry.

Learn More >

 

Delivering Solutions

ALI produces turn-key results that minimize inventories and maximize cost savings for our customers. Whether it’s a point-of-use imprinted WIP barcode, an ID label, 2D/3D barcodes or a ten-year outdoor rating plate, ALI has the solution. Based on the part’s volume, application and durability requirements, ALI uses flexographic, digital, thermal imprinting or screen print methods. From agency compliance labels (UL, cUL, CSA, AGA) to under-the-hood automotive applications to labeling for medical devices, we print it or set up the customer to print and apply.

Learn More >

ABOUT US

Reliance Packaging is proud member of the Sigma Plastic Group and a full service supplier of flexible packaging materials.

Reliance Packaging provides a substantial advantage by offering high quality flexible packaging products produced domestically or imported depending on our customers needs. We specialize in short production runs to keep our customers inventory at a minimum as well as long production runs for large volume items that require consistent high quality at an aggressive price.

Our Strategy is to provide a service that is both cost effective and efficient, by providing flexible packaging materials and services that meet the individual needs of our customers. We believe that a customized approach to the market provides a more effective long term solution for our customers. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail, along with taking the time and care required to assist our customers with a complete solution for all their packaging needs.

Sigma Plastics Group is North America’s largest privately held manufacturer of extruded polyethylene films and bags with over $2.15 Billion in sales. Founded in 1978 with just one facility, today Sigma Plastics now has over 45 locations across North America and 2 locations internationally.

Sigma uses only top-grade raw materials, hires only highly skilled employees, and uses the most advanced manufacturing processes to meet the needs of their customers. Processing over 2 billion pounds of resin each year, Sigma’s ability to secure high quality and inexpensive resin is unmatched with the United States.

Sigma Plastic’s products are highly respected and used in many markets.

• Stretch Films (Hand Wrap Films, Pre-Stretch Films, Machine Wrap Films)
• Custom Films (Mono-Layer films, Co-extruded films, Breathable Films, Agricultural Films)
• Institutional Products (Garment bags, Merchandise bags, Produce bags)

With $2.15 billion in sales and 2 billion pounds of resin per year, Sigma Plastics Group is the LARGEST private film manufacturer in North America!

WE KNOW ROLLSTOCK

With onsite extrusion and years of working directly with bag machine manufacturers, we can produce rollstock that will run fast and accurately.

WE KNOW CONVERTED BAGS

In addition or extruding the film and printing, we have many onsite bag machines that can quickly covert film into preformed bags. These then can easily filled manually at your facility. 

PRINTING

• Wide Web Flexographic printing at our USA based facility

• Printing up to 8 or 10 colors depending on intended press 

• High resolution CMYK process printing capable

• RP-ULTRA-WIDE printing up to 122” via our custom in-setter press application   

• GMI color certified

• Extrusion in-line printing available

• Maximum Print Roll OD: 40 inches

EXTRUSION

• 90 inch Maximum Width

• Five blown extrusion lines on-site

• Custom TUFF-FLEX material offers a unique 3 layer  Co-Extruded

   film for a stronger film with less material.

• Custom DURO-FLEX material for shrink bundling applications.

• Film gauge range 1 mil – 10 mil

• 20 Million pounds of annual capacity

• Maximum Film Roll OD: 40 inches

•  LFT / CFS / SWS

• Unique ULTRA-FLAT film for improved consistency 

   and faster production speed.

STORY

Founded in 1959, Lone Star Container began as a “brown box” business. A first-rate provider of the well-known brown boxes used to ship everything from books to office supplies.

 

Over Fifty years later, a lot has changed. Responding to an ever-changing marketplace, and embracing a tireless work ethic, Lone Star today does much more than manufacture brown boxes.

 

Today Lone Star is involved with anything and everything that is corrugated. Retail packaging, elaborate temporary POP displays and protective packaging. We can provide you with any of the above items from the conceptual stage to supply chain fulfillment.

 

Lone Star is privately owned and operated, answering not to shareholders, but to clients like yourself.

 

John McLeod Jr.

THE BEST IN CUSTOM FOLDING CARTON MANUFACTURING™

TAVO specializes in carton solutions for large-volume customers, with a focus on quick-serve restaurant, food service, refrigerated/frozen foods and bakery products. TAVO is recognized and valued as the preferred manufacturer of best-in-class custom folding carton solutions. We are known for our consistent reliability and responsiveness; renowned for our high-quality products; and sought after for our combination of capabilities and expertise, which gives customers the confidence of an uninterrupted supply chain.

TAVO serves some of the world’s most recognized brands. Having aligned with suppliers of all paperboard grades through long-term industry relationships, TAVO uses its buying power to bring customers a competitive price while producing the most sustainable, most memorable packaging in the industry.

Why TAVO?
QUALITY

Our rigorous process monitoring and Total Quality Management approach enables us to monitor and address fixes before products are produced.

CAPABILITIES AND EXPERTISE

We have the capacity for large volume production, with extensive warehousing capability, in-house design, die shop and plate-mixing capabilities.

TECHNOLOGY

We use industry-leading technology using CAD equipment, sheet-fed offset and large format web-fed flexographic equipment.

ENVIRONMENTALLY-CONSCIOUS

We use recyclable, sustainable and green materials sourced from credible paper and tree farms, and we employ green solutions that contribute to a greener planet.

Setting the industry standard for carton manufacturing

TAVO distributes cartons globally, using industry-leading technology to create and produce new designs, and more cost-effective solutions — all executed with ease and simplicity using CAD equipment, sheet-fed offset and large format web-fed flexographic equipment. We’re proud to offer a technology approach that sets the industry standard for best-in-class operations.

The right people, the right equipment, the right expertise.

Our expert staff negotiates the complex packaging and distribution landscape for you. With in-house design, die making and plate making, we have the right resources and tools to produce both large-scale and short-run requests. Add extensive warehousing and in-house rail to the list, and our capabilities speak for themselves.

QUALITY
Because nothing but the best will do.

From the condition of our plant, to our processes, to our products, we ensure exceptional quality in our operations and the products we manufacture. With rigorous process monitoring and a Total Quality Management approach, we pride ourselves on providing the products our clients envision on time, every time.

SUSTAINABILITY
Doing our part for a greener world.

Protecting the environment is key to our philosophy. We use recyclable, sustainable materials sourced from credible paper and tree farms, and we employee green solutions like solar energy, LED lights and motion sensors for lighting energy-conserving operations that contribute to a greener planet.

Manufacturing and material sourcing have changed significantly over the years and Pitt Plastics has demonstrated innovation and adaptability to meet our customer’s needs. We strive to deliver an excellent customer experience, while creating a business partnership to provide products to fill your needs.

We offer the full bundle of products, to service a wide range of markets, including institutional can liners, medical waste liners, FDA approved foodservice liners, industrial heavy gauge liners, compostable liners, recycled can liners, gloves, and a full line of foodservice products.

With warehouses located in Pittsburg, KS, Morrow, GA, and Columbus, OH we service all geographic locations efficiently.

Welcome to Marking Systems Inc.: Your Partner in Innovative Marking Solutions

Marking Systems Inc. is a premier provider of exceptional marking and identification solutions designed to meet the specific needs of various industries. With a legacy dating back to 1971, we have built a reputation for delivering unparalleled quality and efficiency. Our commitment to customer satisfaction has enabled us to serve businesses in manufacturing and engineering effectively, ensuring that we address their unique requirements with precision. Our innovative solutions not only enhance operational efficiency but also contribute to the overall success of our clients by providing reliable identification and marking systems that withstand the test of time.

Our experts help our customers design new applications or troubleshoot existing problems.

We've got you covered.

Who We Are

Marking Systems Inc. is a family-owned business based in Garland, TX, with a proud history of innovation and dedication. Founded by Henry Van Beber, who began his career with 3M's Commercial Graphics division, our company has grown from humble beginnings in Richardson, Texas, to an industry leader in custom marking solutions.

We continually adapt to meet the evolving demands of our clients and industries, utilizing the latest technologies and best practices. Our rapid prototyping services enable quick adaptation and innovation in your product lineup.

Quality and Reliability

Certified by ISO9001:2015, we bring exceptional quality and reliability to every project. Our strong partnerships, including being a 3M Preferred Converter, guarantee you receive the best materials and solutions available.

Exceptional Customer Service

Electronics Label Solutions

IDENTCO is the leader in track and trace labeling for printed circuit boards and electronic components. IDENTCO label materials and thermal transfer ribbons are fully tested to withstand the extremes of heat and cleaning chemistries found in the board assembly process. IDENTCO offers a full range of blank polyimide and polyester labels, printers, and ribbons for manual application. Automate your SMT labeling with IDENTCO's PPL Series of miniature polyimide labels and ILP Series SMT label feeder for use in popular pick and place machines.

innovative technology.

featured special effect: holographic coating.

it’s just our mindset.

We take on the difficult jobs, the ones others say can’t be done. Welcome to Amerisource Companies

At Amerisource Companies, based in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, we are more than a custom shipping boxes manufacturer. We are an ideas and solutions company. We strive to be your valued business partner and want to help your business — large or small — package, transport and manage inventory. It just so happens that corrugated product packaging and design is our primary area of expertise, but a partnership with us isn’t just about buying corrugated boxes, it’s about building a relationship with a knowledgeable, trusted, committed sourcing partner. We will deliver value to your business and actively contribute to your success in the marketplace. Whether you are looking for quick-turn, short-run custom jumbo boxes, conventional shipping containers, custom-printed corrugated boxes, or product packaging of any kind, Amerisource Companies is here to deliver the right solution on time and on-budget.

Our mission is to bring you quality, reliability and continuous innovation in custom product packaging at a fair price. Amerisource Companies provides a host of services developed to address fundamental issues facing our customers every day. We are dedicated to helping you lower your total cost of procurement through improved efficiency, better packaging design to maximize your spend, and enhanced productivity, while providing the best customer service experience. Our team members have worked long and hard to build a world-class and operationally superior supply-chain organization, which today by any measure is the most customer-centric in the business. It has taken us a few years to get here, and now we are very proud to be one of the fastest growing manufacturers of custom shipping boxes and corrugated containers in the industry.

Amerisource Companies possesses exceptional supply-chain knowledge and draws from our collective industry experience of 95+ years to implement comprehensive, high ROI custom product packaging solutions. We don’t just accept the norm — we push the limits to see what more can be achieved. Today, our team members are actively building a platform to develop customer-oriented programs to improve everything from process information flow to inventory management to materials procurement.

Packaging supplies and systems are critical components of your business operations. Amerisource Companies can help you achieve lower operating costs by driving innovation, sustainability and productivity. We are true business partners, offering our customers the support, scalable resources and wide range of specialized market expertise needed to grow their businesses.

Industry Partnerships

Now Offering Handle Carryout Bags

Carry-out and delivery continue to be on the rise. That’s why we’re here to make sure your chain restaurant has all the handle carry-out bags needed to keep up with demand! Our handle carry-out bags are made from white Virgin Kraft or Natural Kraft papers with recycled content. They’re perfect for mid-to-larger regional and national restaurant chains, ranging from QSRs and Fast Casuals to Full Service. Learn how our paper products can benefit your operation’s needs here.

We’re Proud to announce Fischer Paper Products | Goodness Within.
Trust. Quality. Commitment.

At Fischer, we believe in doing the right thing, the right way. We aim to earn your trust. That means more than just delivering quality products. It means delivering on our word.

We are GFSI Certified

GFSI (Global Food Safety Initiative) certification is becoming the most important and widely accepted food safety standards across the globe. Becoming GFSI certified helps us to meet the demands of a globalized market for improving food safety across the food supply chain and to further service our internationally active customers.

About Fischer

Caring about the little things. It's a Fischer tradition that's three generations, and 50 years, strong. Our exceptional service and commitment to perfection make packaging easy, so you can focus on selling more of what goes inside of our top-of-the-line paper products instead.

At Rochester 100® , we are focused on providing you with the best quality products and service at a price you can afford.
We specialize in creating folders, vinyl document holders, and plastic sleeves that help schools, offices, and businesses operate effectively.

All of our products are made with your need for a long-lasting solution in mind, which is why we make each solution
with the highest-quality materials that won’t tear or break as a result of repeated use. Unlike other products on the market, ours are developed for
any application, and if you can’t find what you need, we will custom-make it for you without delay.



Nicky’s Folders®

Whether you are storing important documents or trying to keep your students organized between work and school, our best-selling Nicky’s Folders® are the best choice.

We offer several two-pocket polypropylene folder options, including our Nicky’s® Communicator Folder and Nicky’s® Classwork Folder. Both will not only help improve communication between a student’s teacher and their parents but also help keep track of incomplete and completed work. We also offer multiple pocket folders for larger projects and multi-course organization.

These folders are made with durable polypropylene and a patented sealing technology that resists wear and tear from repeated use. Plus, the material is waterproof, meaning you can wipe away spills without damage and sanitize the folder to prevent the spread of germs from the classroom to the home.

Vinyl Holders

No matter the document you want to protect or store, our vinyl holders provide the perfect solution. From school and business documents to certificates and business cards to job tickets and IDs, your documents will be kept safe in our durable vinyl holders.

Each holder is made to resist tears, damage from spills, and wear from long-term use. That means you can stick your adhesive holders in high-traffic areas and wear your bank ID holders every day without worrying about damage to the holder itself or the document inside.

You can also make sure your vinyl folders and holders are tailored to fit your exact needs with our custom imprinting options. Add logos and words, change colors, and choose from thousands of size options to create a solution that is exactly what you want.

For questions about our products, quotes on an order, or other information, feel free to email us or give us a call at (800) 498-1463 — we’re always here to help.

Price. Quality. Service.

Our Mission. To provide affordable, American made, quality products with outstanding customer service. Proudly made in Rochester, NY

Get to Know Us
Providing Expert Packaging Solutions and Quality Service

Delivering you a custom packaging solution is what we dream about at night. Inventory management and custom fulfillment occupy our dinnertime discussions. At ABOX, packaging is our passion and we bring a lifetime of printing experience and an uncompromising commitment to detail to each and every piece of material that passes through our door. 

That means exceptional quality for our customers, respect and caring for our team and support for our local community.

Our Goal
Why Our Clients Love Us

Our goal is to make working with us easy, rewarding, and fun. Pretty much everything we do is focused on that goal. That is why we do everything under one roof – OURS. We order paper direct from the manufacturers in truckload quantities. We design packages in-house complete with 3D modeling and build all our production dies ourselves. All package finishing, including gluing and windows, happens right here. We even make our shipping boxes. We have eliminated waiting time for raw materials, die production, and finishing. This means we are ready for you when you need us.

Why is Ecopax

Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do at Ecopax. We are committed to using renewable resources and creating fully sustainable packaging to reduce waste and protect the environment. We believe that exceptional products deserve exceptional service. Our dedicated customer support team is always ready to assist you with personalized solutions and expert guidance.

Our Corporate Recycling Services

Pioneer tailors solutions to meet your specific recycling needs. Our services include:

Plant operations, processing and sales

Products We Buy, Process and Sell

Our primary focus is recycled paper of various grades, and we offer both paper processing and brokerage services. Through our own recycling plants, Pioneer produces loads of recycled commodities that we sell to paper mills and manufacturers.

Paper products include high grade paper, bulk grade paper and obsolete roll stock. While generally thought of as a paper recycling company, Pioneer will handle your recycled plastics and metals as part of your overall program.

Get Ready, Get Set, Recycle!

Are you ready for a recycling program that maximizes revenue while reducing your carbon footprint?

Is your company in the market for recycled materials that you can convert into new consumer products?

Pioneer is happy to visit your location to discuss your operation and the recycled materials you generate.

Want a Fresh Start? Recycle Your Career!

At Pioneer Industries, we recognize that our employees are our greatest resources. We foster a work environment that makes all team members feel valued, encourages them to develop their skills, and helps them advance their careers. Keeping employees engaged and happy keeps them with us for the long haul — some team members even spend their entire careers with us!

VIEW CAREER OPPORTUNITIES

"I started working for Pioneer Industries International, Inc. straight out of high school with zero work experience. I started in the plant doing a variety of positions. After two years, I was promoted to forklift operator and now I am the Plant Supervisor. Pioneer offers opportunities to grow. I am supported by the management team and the other leaders in the company. Hard work is recognized at Pioneer, but we also make time to have fun! Pioneer is a great place to grow and work!"

Plant Supervisor

Industry-Leading Recycling Company …

Pioneer Industries International is one of the most respected and well-known commercial recycling companies in the business. Our expert, experienced professionals will customize a program that solves your recycling problems while identifying markets for your recyclables, reducing your disposal costs and adding to your bottom line.

Suppliers and customers enjoy working with Pioneer for our competitive pricing, on-time pickups, prompt payment and the best customer service in the industry! In addition to personal contact — you always talk to a live person — our world-class service includes secure, online access to real-time information and reporting, so you can manage your recycling program 24/7 from anywhere. 

… With a Local, Regional and National Reach

Since 1974, Pioneer Industries has become one of the largest independent recycling organizations in the country. Our brokerage division offers solutions to national and global customers through our vast network of recycling partners throughout the United States. The processing side of our company is made up of seven plants and sales offices, serving our local and regional suppliers:

Pioneer Fibers, Inc., Elk Grove Village, IL — Processing and brokerage services.
Batliner Converting, Kansas City, KS — Converting facility.
Batliner Recycling, Kansas City, MO — Recycling operations.
Batliner Recycling, Oklahoma City, OK — Single stream and dual stream recycling.
Pioneer Paper Stock of Texas, Dallas, TX — Recycling services.
Pioneer Paper Stock, New Brighton, MN — Recycling services.
Pioneer SecureShred, New Brighton, MN — Confidential document destruction.

Overview of Tilsner Carton Company

In 1918 Isadore Tilsner began collecting used boxes for resale. He collected the boxes from liquor stores throughout St. Paul. The demand for used boxes was just enough for Isadore to make a modest living.  This was the beginning of Tilsner Carton Company.

​

Today, Tilsner Carton Company can meet all of your needs related to corrugated. In addition to producing stock and custom boxes we manufacture packaging and point-of-purchase displays.  We also manufacture and refurbish pallets.  Our services include providing a team of award-winning structural and graphic designers to help you meet your objectives along with fulfillment and shipping teams to streamline your products to market.  Contact us with your needs today!

THE LATEST FROM PDC
FROM THE PDC NEWSROOM

April 5, 2023
PRESS RELEASE
PDC Launches SecurBand® Wristbands to Provide Simple Visual ID for Events and Entertainment Venues
PDC, a global leader of identification solutions, announced today the launch of the SecurBand® wristband for single-day events. Developed to be the most affordable single-day-use wristband for simple and easy identification, SecurBand® wristbands are highly-vibrant and easy to see at a distance, making them the perfect choice for controlling event access. Their non-transferable strong adhesive and tamper-evident cuts prevent reuse, increasing security.

March 6, 2023
PRESS RELEASE
Vizient, Inc. Awards National Contract to PDC for Medical Labels
PDC, a global leader in healthcare identification and patient safety solutions, announced today that it has been awarded a contract with Vizient, Inc., the nation’s leading healthcare performance improvement company. The contract, effective March 1, 2023, gives Vizient members access to increased savings for the PDC medical label portfolio, which is the largest in the industry. It includes pharmacy labels, laboratory labels, chart labels, pre-printed communication labels, anesthesia labels, anesthesia tapes and more.

October 25, 2022
PRESS RELEASE
PDC Launches Comfort Cushion™ Mammography Pad to Help Breast Health Centers Improve the Patient Experience
PDC, a global leader of innovative identification and patient safety solutions, announced today the launch of the Comfort Cushion™ Mammography Pad for use by mammography providers, including hospitals and breast and women’s health centers. The cushy pad is applied by mammography technicians to the receptor plate of the mammography machine to reduce patient discomfort during compression. While October is Breast Cancer Awareness month, a time when the nation emphasizes the need for screening for early detection of cancer, mammography clinicians are concerned that mammography screening volumes still have not returned to pre-COVID-19 levels.

January 24, 2022
PRESS RELEASE
PDC announces a distribution agreement with Cancard, Inc. for the Canadian market
PDC has selected Cancard, Inc. as a distributor to offer PDC’s complete portfolio of identification solutions for patients, people, and products in Canada.

November 1, 2021
PRESS RELEASE
PDC Introduces Ident-Alert® IV Port Clips to Help Anesthesiologists Prevent Medication Errors
Colored Clips Developed by PDC and Anesthesiologist, Dr. Christopher Walters, Provide a Visual Cue at the IV Injection Port

Flexible Packaging With a Flexible Company

As a nationally recognized rigid and flexible packaging company, Maco Pkg is excited to accept your project and make it our own. Our custom-made packaging options fulfill a wide variety of purposes and industries. We gladly accept any challenge you can introduce to us. Explain your mission and we provide solutions.

What We can Do for You

Maco PKG, an ISO 9001:2008, SQF 2000 Level 3 certified facility, manufactures heat sealable pouches and custom package bags, along with contract packaging services. We buy roll stock, which includes Military Spec films, metal film, linear low density polyethylene (LLDPE), high density polyethylene (HDPE), nylon/LLDPE blends and polyester/LLDPE blends.

Experienced Management Team
Leading-Edge Design, Engineering, & Manufacturing
In-House Research and Development Lab
Expeditious Co-Packing & Assembly
Affordable & Quick Turn-Around
Custom Flexible Packaging Manufacturing Process

We convert roll stock into pouches, film bags, standup pouches, side gusset bags, sheets, roll stock flexible packaging, and speciality items. Maco PKG pouches and bags, custom made, can be die cut and sealed. Our pouches incorporate vacuum,  water vapor, odor and debris barriers, as well as zipper closures.

Maco PKG supplies a full range of ESD and static shielded bags for the electronics industry and US Military. In addition, we offer a variety of laminations, including film to-foil, paper-to-foil and film-to-film. Metalized film, adhesive and extrusion laminations, and organic packaging solutions are also available.

Virtually Limitless Options

Our custom 3D bags have five sides and can line containers or cover equipment during shipping. We use release coated films when we manufacture these bags, which suits them to package adhesives.

Maco PKG creates heavy duty packaging, including leak-proof seals, duplex double-wall bags, inline die-shape sealing and cutting, heavy-gauge side seals, and tape closures.

With a history of professional experience, we serve many industries such as pharmaceutical, photographic, dental, medical, automotive, military, electronics, retail, and food.

WHY CONNECT WITH KEY CONTAINER?

Key Container, together with sister companies, Custom & Miller Box and Mount Tom Box, is a leading, integrated provider of corrugated packaging products and solutions. In our state-of-the-art facilities, we combine paper with raw materials to create corrugated sheets and manufacture custom and stock boxes, die cut boxes, and displays. Controlling all aspects of the production process allows us to consistently and expeditiously provide the highest level of quality and exceed our customers’ expectations.

Our team of dedicated customer service representatives and sales personnel, with the support of our in-house design team, will walk you through all aspects of the production process to meet your packaging needs.

RIGID PAPERBOARD PACKAGING

For over 85 years, Dura-Fibre has been manufacturing strong, attractive, money-saving laminated, heavy duty paperboard products, including:

Book Binding Board
Paperboard Sheets
Specialty Paperboard Products
Paperboard Packaging
Packaging Substrates
Custom Rigid Paperboard Products
Creating the Best Paperboard Solutions for Your Business

Dura-Fibre combines decades of paperboard manufacturing experience with a 125,000-square-foot facility in Menasha, Wisconsin. We offer best-in-class laminated, thick paperboard products created with industry-leading equipment.

1
REQUIREMENT GATHERING

To create customer paperboard products, our experienced team first works to understand your goals and needs.

2
DESIGN

We design your products using top-quality high-strength paper to make a thick and strong laminated paperboard with no wasted space or material.

3
IN-HOUSE TESTING

Our in-house design lab tests your products for strength, durability and water resistance to ensure it holds up to your end-use requirements.

4
SAMPLES

Once our testing is complete, we’ll provide you with samples, allowing you to see, touch and try your new product in person.

5
CLIENT TESTING

Once you’ve approved the samples, we’ll provide you with a final version, which you can test in the field to make certain it checks all your boxes.

6
PRODUCTION

After you’ve tested your product, we’ll work with you to arrange production and shipping, based on your short- and long-term needs.

STEP 1 STEP 2 STEP 3 STEP 4 STEP 5 STEP 6
Heavy-duty Paperboard. Best-in-class Service.

Dura-Fibre understands the value of customer service. We combine our rigid paperboard products with on-time delivery, reliability and unique and customized solutions.

About Pro-Pak
Continually evolving to meet the needs of the marketplace has been a tradition at Pro-Pak for decades. Founded in 1948 by Charles L. Deiger, and his wife Adele, our company began as the Production Shippers Box Co., building wooden crates for Toledo’s Willys-Overland Motors – makers of the now world-famous Jeep.

In 1969, we adopted the name Pro-Pak Industries. Today, Charles’ and Adele’s sons – Leo, Mike and Tony Deiger – along with a third generation of Deigers, manage the company of more than 200 employees, multi-color presses and die cutters, two manufacturing locations, a truck fleet, and 150,000 square feet of warehouse space.

ISO

At Pro-Pak Industries, we are proud to offer ISO-certified quality management services for cardboard packaging, ensuring that our clients receive packaging solutions that meet the highest international standards. Our ISO certification demonstrates our commitment to quality, consistency, and continuous improvement in every aspect of our packaging production. By adhering to the rigorous standards of ISO 9001, we ensure that all of our processes, from design to delivery, are optimized for efficiency, quality, and reliability. When you partner with Pro-Pak Industries, you can trust that your packaging will not only meet but exceed industry expectations for performance and safety.

LEARN MORE
Quality
Vertical Integration

At Pro-Pak Industries, we provide comprehensive vertical integration services for cardboard packaging, allowing our clients to benefit from a fully streamlined and efficient packaging supply chain. Vertical integration means that we manage every aspect of the packaging process, from raw material sourcing and design to manufacturing and final delivery. By controlling all stages of production, we are able to ensure consistent quality, reduce costs, and accelerate turnaround times. For our clients, this translates to superior packaging solutions that meet their exact needs while optimizing their business operations.

THE LEADING SOURCE OF
HIGH-QUALITY INSULATION VAPOR RETARDERS

Lamtec Corporation is a global supplier of insulation vapor retarders and facings to the leading manufacturers, laminators and fabricators of fiberglass, rockwool, foam board and tape. Our focus is the building products market, specifically facings for the Metal Building (New and Retrofit/Re-Cover), HVAC (Duct Wrap and Duct Board), Mechanical (Pipe and Tank), Foam Board / Panel, Tape and OEM insulation segments.

For over 40 years, our philosophy has been simple, "Design and manufacture the very best in laminated insulation facing / vapor retarders, offer them at competitive pricing, deliver them on time and follow-up with comprehensive technical support".

Learn More
Facings for Metal Building Insulation

Lamtec Corporation is a global supplier of insulation vapor retarders and facings to the Metal Building Insulation market. Lamtec's insulation vapor retarders and facings are engineered to protect insulation from physical abuse and the damaging effects of moisture. Our facings are designed with proprietary flame retardant chemistry to assist you in meeting demanding fire codes and standards.

View Facings
OEM: HVAC & Appliances

Lamtec's R-3035 and R-3050 FSK and PSK are used by fabricators for the insulation parts supplied to the HVAC and Appliance manufacturers as well as many other OEM manufacturers. Lamtec's R-3035 and R-3050 FSK and WMP-30 PSK facings are UL Classified and protect the insulation from physical abuse while providing outstanding acoustical and fire performance.

View Facings
Facings for Duct Wrap & Duct Board

Lamtec Corporation is a global supplier of insulation facings to the Duct Wrap and Duct Board market. Lamtec's line of FSK facings for this market include, 3035 and R-3035 (Duct Wrap) as well as R-3050 (Duct Board). These facings protect the insulating material from physical abuse.

View Facings
