The post office handles letters, bills, and postcards with ease. But if you need to ship large posters, blueprints, banners, and other bulky, fragile items through the postal service, you'll want more protection than a typical padded envelope provides.

At Chicago Mailing Tube Co. in Chicago, IL, you can purchase a variety of mailing cores and tubes that will shield your items from wrinkling, bending, and warping during shipment. Our mailing containers consist of high-quality recycled materials, so you can rest easy knowing that your products will survive the trip.

Protect Your Mail From Damage

When you shop with us, you never want for options. From large-diameter cores to kraft tubes to heavy-duty tubes to telescopic tubes, you can find perfectly sized and shaped mailing containers to fit your needs. For a complete list of our available tubes, browse our product pages above.

Don't see what you want? Talk to one of our representatives. We can create custom tubes that meet your specifications.

Ship With Ease

Once you've purchased your mailing containers, we'll ship your order within 24 hours to ensure a speedy delivery. We have our own truck fleet to minimize shipping costs, so you don't have to worry about placing a minimum order.

Although we have a location in Chicago, Illinois, we serve nationwide. No matter if you live in Arlington Heights, IL or Los Angeles, CA, you can count on us for reliable shipments and affordable prices.

We Serve Chicago, IL and All Surrounding Areas

If you have a large project in mind, don't hesitate to request a quote. You can also call us at (312) 243-6050 to speak to one of our customer service representatives. 

Recycling

Our products are made from 100% recycled materials.

Shipping

We'll pack and ship your order to help reduce shipping costs.

Quotes

Complete and submit the online form to request information or to receive a quote.

Request a quote

PRODUCER OF METALLIZED & CLEAR FILM SUBSTRATES FOR A BROAD RANGE OF MARKETS

 
​
New 96" Metallizer
​
Available Now- Call today for details
​

Rol-Vac, LP is an industry leader for converted Metallized & Clear films.  With over 35 years of experience we pride ourselves on fast turn around times, high yields, customizable applications, & unmatched quality.  Having a team committed to ensuring our customers satisfaction keeps us one step ahead of our peers.  Whether you print, coat, or laminate, we have both metallized and clear films available cut to size in our 50,000sqft facility.

​

Contract Metallizing & Slitting

Whether it's Clear Film or Metallized, Rol-Vac, LP will manufacture your film to the desired width & length, to specific metal layers, and more.  With capabilities up to 96", Optical Density from 0.18 - 4.50, along with several machines to convert.  We are confident that you will receive unmatched quality from our team of experts.

Crynsulate Metallized SuperInsulation Film

This light weight super reflective metallized polyester film is specific to the Cryogenic and AeroSpace industries for several applications including MLI systems.  Advantages include increased aluminum deposition per pass (0.5 - 0.8 Ohms/sq) resulting in increased metal adhesion.

Rol-Vac, LP Inventory Hold Program

Tired of tying up revenue and warehouse space with inventory?  With the ability to house many substrates and slit-to-width on demand, Rol-Vac, LP will create a custom inventory management program to fit your needs while effectively eliminating lead time.

Custom Specialty
Films

Improve value and opportunities with some of Rol-Vac, LP newest brands.  Now offering Brushed, Soft Touch, Alox, & High Barrier Films in addition to our standard products.

Fast-Turnaround Delivery Program

Having trouble getting your sample produced in-house in a timely fashion?  Rol-Vac, LP now offers 5-10 day turnarounds for all your must have sample items. 

Custom Specialty
Metals

Looking for something other than Metallized Aluminum?  Rol-Vac, LP offers Vacuum Metallized Copper, which is available on several different substrates. 

R & D

Whether you're a University, Fortune 500 company, or a small business, everyone does R&D work.  Rol-Vac, LP offers our equipment and staff, hourly rates apply, for you and

your colleagues to collaborate and create the exact film required to meet your specifications.

Home
Manufacturing Superior Performance Medium and High Density Overlays

Paneltech is a forward-thinking company comprised of individuals who share a common goal: to make valuable surfaces the right way. This means high-quality products that are both functionally superior and environmentally sound.

Quality Products:


All of our products are made with an emphasis on quality: Quality in the resin systems, quality in the paper substrates and quality in the production process. Our overlays are completely saturated through their profile. This cannot be achieved with a high-speed, low-cost approach. Complete saturation is crucial to the proven durability and performance of the overlay in concrete form as well as general purpose applications.

Superior Performance:

Our overlays have been proven on the past 20 years through rigorous testing and field application. We strive to continuously improve our products to deliver more features and provide the ultimate in field performance.

Outstanding Value

We are always willing to compete for your business. If we can’t beat a competitor’s offer, we’ll tell you exactly why.

Competent and Responsive Service

We have been manufacturing overlays for over 20 years now. Our staff knows how to solve issues regarding performance of the panel/overlay system. Our experience includes a broad base of resin chemistry and web and panel manufacturing.

Paneltech along with its sister company, PaperStone, is headquartered at the Port of Grays Harbor in Hoquiam, Washington. Our on-site complex includes a treating facility, resin plant, press operation and multiple warehouses.

WELCOME TO BADGER TAG & LABEL

Badger Tag & Label Corporation, a family owned business since 1935, is a custom printer of tags and labels. Badger is always available to help develop the most useful tag and/or label solution at the best value. Over the years we have increased our capabilities to produce more than just your traditional tags or labels. The very personal customer care we offer is our top priority. We want to be your “tag and label consultant”!

Badger Tag & Label will continually strive to provide quality products at competitive prices to our customers nationwide and beyond. We believe in small town values and take customer service very seriously. Our customers know we are a company in the Midwest in whom they can place their trust.

HOME BIOSTRAW SUSTAINABLE PRODUCTS NEWS ABOUT US CONTACT
Best Diamond Plastics
	
Innovating for today. . . and tomorrow.
Best Diamond Plastics maintains a state-of-the art plastic extrusion manufacturing facility in Chicago with the latest manufacturing technology. Our investment in technology and innovation allows us to produce straws and other plastic products faster, and more resourcefully, than our competition.


​
​
​Our latest innovation, BioStraw, is a recyclable, compostable, and ​fully biodegradable drinking straw. By incorporating an environmentally-friendly additive, we've created a plastic drinking straw that biodegrades like a leaf in the natural environment... leaving nothing behind.
Biodegradable Cutlery
In addition to our biodegradable straws, we also offer a sustainable option for cutlery. PHA is considered a viable alternative to petroleum-based plastic because the new technology allows its plastic waste to decompose completely in the ocean and soil in a significantly shorter period of time.
Why Choose Us?
​Our Employees, Suppliers and Customers are our most valued partners.
We maintain a 99.5% fill rate.
Ensured product quality at 99.99%, consistently meeting specification standards.
Certified SQF Level 2 at the level excellence.
Adhering to strict social accountability standards through third-party audits.
Offering competitively priced products.
We are a 100% Black-owned business situated in an Empowerment Zone on Chicago’s Southside.
We actively support the local community where we operate.
Background
Best Diamond Plastics LLC (BDPL) is a Black-owned manufacturing company in Chicago, producing plastic products including eco-friendly Bio Straws and cutlery. We engage with the community through job fairs, youth outreach, and donations. BDPL supplies various items to restaurant chains nationwide and aims for international growth.

We make materials. Better.
Tundra is a material additives company that helps customers make better-performing products and develop new opportunities.

Leveraging our proprietary additive technology, Tundra provides materials optimized with enhanced properties for a variety of applications. Composites can be made lighter, stronger, denser, safer or more flexible while remaining cost-competitive.

Businesses benefit from differentiating material performance that:
Replaces existing materials and enables new solutions
Opens new market opportunity
Improves cost efficiency
We currently offer the following platforms optimized for specific end-uses:
Tundra’s proprietary additive technology. This additive enables all of Tundra’s product platforms: Eklipse®, Ikonik®, and Dynamik®.
Polymerized coating that layers an even surface over the particle, optimizing polymer contact points
Particles self-order by size and pack densely within the polymer
Particle surface states are controlled for desired material properties.
Highly filled composites filled with fibers allowing for reinforcement of polymers.
Platform Benefits:
Reduced Expansion and Contraction (CoTE)
Stability at High Temperature (HDT)
Strength and Stiffness
Enhanced Processability
Minimal Equipment Wear
Reduced Water Sensitivity
Highly filled composites filled with particles which serve functions.
Platform Benefits:
Light-Weighting
Densification
Magnetism
Flexibility
Processing Improvement
Polymer Extension
Highly packed composites with metal or ceramic particles optimized for metal injection molding(MIM), ceramic injection molding (CIM), and additive manufacturing (AM).
Platform Benefits:
High Dimensional Stability
Exceptional Isotropic Characteristics
Large and Complex Parts
Reduced Part Variability (High Yield)
Exceptional Mold Flow
Exceptional Green & Brown State Strength
Multiple Debind Options

RIGHT-SIZED SOLUTIONS

From small runs to truckload-sized orders, from F-flute to triple wall, we'll get you the right solution!

CUSTOM CORRUGATED BOXES AND INDUSTRIAL PACKAGING

Package Crafters develops the most effective custom packaging method to ship, protect, and promote your products. From simply sizing a brown box to designing a complex point-of-purchase display, we are committed to finding the most functional and efficient solution for your packaging needs.

We use innovative board grades and flute combinations, from n-flute to triple wall corrugated, to give our customers practical solutions not commonly offered in the marketplace. We also design in and utilize solid fiber, corrugated plastic, weather-resistant papers, and specialty coatings.

EXPLORE SERVICES
CAD DESIGN SERVICES
Our in-house designers and knowledgeable sales staff use state-of-the-art Computer Aided Design (CAD) software and computer-controlled precision equipment to rapidly prototype your design.
INVENTORY MANAGEMENT
We customize our warehousing and logistics services to match your business model. Just-in-time delivery, point-of-use placement or a pick-pull-pack system is tailored to you needs.
SCALING SOLUTIONS
Let us offer solutions to improve your packaging efficiency and output, enabling your business to grow.
WHAT WE DO

As experts in packaging design and customization, Package Crafters will manufacture your packaging to your exact specifications, or we will handle the design for you, including prototyping and testing. Our contract packaging and fulfillment services free up your resources—allowing you to concentrate on sales and innovation.

TIME-SENSITIVE CONTRACT PACKAGING
DESIGN & FULFILLMENT OF "CLUB" AND
"PALLET" PACK DESIGNS
FULL ASSEMBLY, PREP, & SHIPPING

What does it mean to be a 3M™ Preferred Converter?

The 3M™ brand is recognized globally as an innovative leader in adhesive technologies. While it is possible for most companies to purchase and convert 3M™ products, only a few are selected by the corporation as Preferred Converters. This designation recognizes elite converting companies that consistently exceeded others in quality, capabilities, experience and customer service. CFS is proud to be in this unique group.

About Us

PLPS was formed in 2021 to bring together a group of award-winning converters with decades of experience in the Healthcare, Wellness, Beauty & Personal Care, Household, Food & Beverage, and Aerospace industries. With an entrepreneurial spirit and ingenuity, each company started with just one press and was focused on delivering the personal touch of a small business. Forming one company with broader capabilities, redundancy, and market proficiency allows our clients to get the best of both worlds: the personal touch of a small business with the infrastructure of a large organization.


Read More
Our Companies

Whether you’re in our backyard or in another country, our focus on service and attention to quality does not change with a time zone.

Established in 1987, Overnight Labels, LLC is an award-winning printer of custom labels, shrink sleeves, flexible packaging, and packaging prototypes. We work with major global corporations, independent start-ups, and everyone in between. Overnight Labels became part of Premium Labels & Packaging Solutions in 2021.

Learn more

Since 1989, Luminer has specialized in combining adhesive coating technology with narrow web flexographic printing and converting expertise. The company has two facilities, and is a leader in several industry niches, chief among them extended content labels (ECLs) for clinical trial and other pharmaceutical applications.

Learn more

Founded in 1979, Label Graphics Manufacturing produces pressure sensitive labels, shrink sleeves, and coupons. They offer both flexo and letterpress printing and are experts in plough folds, multipage booklets, peelbacks, tube laminate decorating and hot stamping.

Learn more

Formed over two decades ago in Syracuse, NY, HP Mile, Inc. manufactures printed pharmaceutical and medical labels for product packaging used worldwide. Our success comes from our ability to adapt and make changes quickly, while always keeping our commitment to printing and delivering millions of zero defect labels.

Learn more

Formed in 1972 and later purchased by HP Mile, Inc. in 2016, Privateer Ltd. manufactures identification tapes, labels, and nameplates to rigorous aerospace and military specifications (MIL-STD-1247 and MIL-T-9906). Located in Old Saybrook, CT, we are one of only two certified manufacturers of Fluid Line Tapes in the world.

Learn more

While Privateer Ltd was growing its niche business in the aerospace sector, food, beverage, health, and beauty brands also sought label printing services from the company. To serve these consumer-focused markets, Label One was formed in 1980 as a subsidiary of Privateer, operating alongside them in Old Saybrook, CT.

Learn more

CUSTOM PACKAGING EXPERTS

Founded over 45 years ago, Triple P Packaging, Inc. has steadily grown to become one of New England’s premier packaging suppliers. We are headquartered 25 miles south of Boston, in Brockton, MA, and have over 100,000 square feet of manufacturing and storage space to serve our customers quickly and efficiently.

Whether you are a small retail business or a Fortune 500 international conglomerate, let us show you what we can do. We supply a full array of packaging materials & products at extremely competitive prices, but where we truly excel is in designing and building custom packaging to meet and exceed our customers’ unique needs. Whether the project calls for corrugated boxes, protective foam, folding chipboard, air cushions, or wood crating, we have the capability and know-how to quickly and cost efficiently package your products.

We are proud that over the years, Triple P Packaging, Inc. has built an unparalleled reputation for the highest level of quality, innovation, and service throughout New England’s manufacturing and distribution businesses. Please browse through our website to learn more about our company and our capabilities, and feel free to contact us with any questions. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you!

Protective Packaging

UPPI is an industry leader of thermoformed protective packaging, including Polypropylene Packaging, HDPE Packaging, and PLA Packaging. From concept to production, we provide innovative, custom-designed, cost-efficient, and functional packaging solutions for the medical retail, electronics, industrial, and food industries.

Custom Package Design

When you take talented people and arm them with the latest and greatest in technology, you have a winning formula. That’s exactly what we have done with our outstanding design team.

3D Printing: Rapid Prototype

3D printing (rapid prototyping) is a process that rapidly produces a high-quality, durable 3-dimensional representation of a product or, in our case, a prototype mold to be used to create packaging samples.

Thermoforming Process

here are many terms to describe the process of converting plastic sheet into a 3D shape or package. Examples of this terminology are: thermoforming, pressure forming, and vacuum forming.

Global Coverage

The location of our headquarters allows us to effectively service 2/3 of the U.S population in one day’s transit time with the rest of the population receiving product in a week or less.

Sustainability

The push for sustainability and environmental responsibility is in full force. We place the highest priority on our relationship with the environment and our responsibility to the environment.

Large Manufacturing Warehouse

Universal Protective Packaging, Inc has a 60,000 + sq.ft. manufacturing and warehouse space under one roof. We have positioned ourselves to handle the demands placed on an industry leader.

ABOUT

RDA Container Corporation was chartered in 1967 as an independently owned packaging company, located in Rochester, New York; specializing in customer demand for low volume next day delivery of customized corrugated containers and allied products at a time when large companies specialized in high volume and delivery scheduling of 5 business days or more. 

​

RDA Container Corporation's primary market is the greater Rochester area, including all of Monroe County. But RDA has expanded its market to Greater Western New York. Because of Corporate Client subsidiaries, RDA has shipped its products nationwide.

​

Electronic file transfer technologies and surface commerce have enabled RDA Container Corporation to work with clients nationwide. Engineering directly from electronic files coupled with express delivery of its Computer Assisted Prototypes ensures expeditious pre-production proofing capabilities. RDA Container Corporation has an excellent reputation for quality and service, and we look forward to servicing you.

OFFERING EXTRUSION, LAMINATION, AND DIE CUTS

Fibre Converters will take your ideas and convert them into laminated paperboard products that fill your commercial or manufacturing needs for your product’s internal structural support, packaging, material handling or other intended end uses.

Fibre Converters extrudes, laminates, and die cuts from a wide range of grades of recycled paper, virgin paper, and paperboard to meet the specifications of our customers. Primary applications include foundation material for automotive interior trim, ready-to-assemble furniture back panels, poly-coated board for packaging, slip sheets for material handling, and exterior sheathing for housing.

Superior Labels for Every Market

For over fifty years, Dion Label Printing, an Inovar company, has been a leader in the label printing industry. Located in Westfield, MA, we provide superior print solutions for brands across various markets and specialize in OTC pharmaceutical, supplements, and medical. Dion has maintained the highest GMI certified printer rating of platinum in both the digital and flexographic categories since 2014. As part of the Inovar Packaging Group family, we continue to innovate in digital and flexographic printing, ensuring top-notch quality and service for all our clients.

PRODUCT GUIDE

 

Dynamic Packaging Solutions, Inc. is an experienced outsourcing partner for companies who require contract packaging for their products and brands. Our expansive, state-of-the art facility and automated production lines efficiently fill liquid bottles, servicing many industries, including the Household, Industrial & Institutional (HI&I) Cleaning and Personal Care Products, while creating new Innovative product concepts.

With over thirty years of expertise in chemical blending, liquid and powder filling, and contract packaging, we are well versed with regulatory and associated compliance issues. We help ensure your contract packaging needs are in full compliance from concept to freight management.

Quality control is assured at Dynamic. When you choose us as your contract packaging partner, you’ll have access to a full range of technical capabilities and services including competitive analysis, testing of incoming raw materials, computerized batch retention system, automated production processing and coding, Safety Data and Technical Data Sheet authoring, quality assurance and certificates of analysis of finished goods.

GET IN TOUCH
Our Capabilities

Arkansas Box, LLC, is a family-owned and operated company that offers custom, premier-quality packaging services and engaged pricing. Our team of dedicated professionals offers a full range of retail, industrial, and protective packaging, including point-of-purchase displays and marketing services, with a heightened focus on customer service.

We meet our clients’ packaging needs with the following capabilities:

Design

We work closely with you to design the perfect solution, ensuring that your product will stand out on the shelves.

LEARN MORE
Corrugated Products

As a full-service corrugated supplier, we custom manufacture all types of corrugated items.

LEARN MORE
Printing and Branding

By providing direct and digital printing methods, we ensure your brand is presented professionally and clearly.

LEARN MORE
Creative Packaging Solutions

In our experience, we have learned that no two companies are alike and, therefore, need a  unique packaging system built to meet their own needs. That’s why Arkansas Box specializes in thinking “outside the box.” 

With over 100 years of combined experience in the world of corrugated packaging, we are able to help our customers save money and time by engineering a custom solution. As your packaging vendor, it is our responsibility to ensure that our customers are utilizing every advantage possible when it comes to their packaging process.

Sustainable Packaging

Environmental sustainability is a crucial factor for the earth’s future, and it is our responsibility as a company to do our part. The demand in the world to offer sustainable products is growing, and we have been successful in many cases in eliminating non-recyclable products with corrugated fiberboard.

Arkansas Box is certified under the requirements of the Sustainable Forestry Initiative® (SFI)® Standard, the world’s largest single forest certification standard. This certification ensures that the fiber used in our packaging products comes from legal and responsible sources.

Corrugated fiberboard is the most recycled material in the world, and we are continually looking for ways to re-engineer packaging for the environmentally conscious company.

ABOUT US

WORLD-CLASS MOLD
MAKING IN THE USA

Founded in 1983, F&S Tool operates a 90,000 square foot facility located on the shores of Lake Erie in Erie, Pennsylvania, USA. F&S Tool specializes in high output, high efficiency hot runner injection molding applications typically with 2-6 million cycles expected per year. In addition to injection molding, F&S Tool is an expert in high volume compression molding applications with similar throughputs.

F&S Tool offers the option to use our facility as an integration center that could include sending your machine, automation and auxiliaries for full molding cell performance certification with our in-house technical experts prior to shipment. As an alternative, F&S Tool offers the use of a range of injection molding machines for sampling, short or medium run production in one of our 20 machine bays.

OUR VALUE PROPOSITION

Strategic
Partnership

Construction

Services

Experience a carefully planned design. Balanced fill especially with asymmetrical gates due to precise gate alignment, hot runner manifold collaboration, uniform cavity temperatures and patented techniques to improve alignment, maximize durability with industry leading fast cycle times.

MARKETS

CORE APPLICATIONS

CAPABILITIES

CONTINUING EVOLUTION,
MAXIMIZING VALUE
SigmaSoft

Every application is designed and simulated in SigmaSoft. This iterative process optimizes the stack construction to produce the fastest cycling, most uniform cavity temperature and durable design. Back feeding actual application data ensures the most accurate interpretation of the virtual molding simulation results.

Plate Production

In 2014 F&S Tool bolstered internal plate production with a 30,000 square foot [2,787 square meter] expansion. Precisely milling the plates allows F&S to provide superior cavity support/alignment, less movement friction, a reduction in clamp tonnage and control of the workflow for an on-time delivery.

Development Center

In 2016 F&S added a 25,000 square foot [2,322 square meter] turn-key molding development center with 20 machine bays for complete certification prior to shipment including post molding automation. The 10 ton crane can accommodate up to a three section 30 ton stack mold (10 tons per section) in one of our sample machines or in your production cell.

S.E. MO. Box in Cape Girardeau, Missouri, provides packaging solutions to businesses and industries from corrugated boxes and shipping cartons to creative full-color product displays. You've probably seen our quality products in the food, pet supply, automotive and electronics industries, just to name a few.

     We know the importance of eye-catching product displays and our design department has the experience and skill to custom design your marketing, display or shipment packaging. View samples of our work from the standard corrugated box to innovative, state-of-the-art displays with full-color art and graphics. Once your design is approved, your order will be filled quickly and accurately in our new manufacturing facility.

     S.E. MO. Box can serve your packaging needs with quality corrugated boxes, containers, cartons, displays and more. We offer JIT/VMI programs, custom solutions and next day delivery. Independently-owned and -operated by the Powderly family for over 30 years, we know the meaning of dependable customer service. Donate to Easterseals today!

In 2023, the unemployment rate for people with disabilities was more than double that of those without disabilities. Barriers such as stigma, subminimum wages, and Social Security program income limits contribute to this. You can empower individuals—especially people with disabilities, older adults, and veterans—to secure employment that strengthens personal independence.

Leading the Way to Full Equity, Inclusion and Access

Trusted by families for more than 100 years, we have worked tirelessly with our partners to enhance quality of life and expand local access to healthcare, education, and employment opportunities. And we won’t rest until every one of us is valued, respected, and accepted.

ARMOR VCI PRODUCTS AND THE TEAM BEHIND THEM TAKE THE
WORK OUT OF YOUR WORKDAY!

Armor Protective Packaging – we’re ERADICATORS OF RUST and we do whatever we can to take the work out of your workday. The ARMOR team takes the business of rust prevention and rust removal very seriously and we apply that same commitment to the ‘business’ of fun. This is our story – it highlights what we do and why we do it – it tells the story of ARMOR VCI (vapor corrosion inhibitor) products and the people behind the ARMOR name.

OUR STORY - WATCH NOW ›
WE ARE AN AWARD-WINNING COMPANY
WHY USE ARMOR VCI PRODUCTS?

Rust happens. If metal is exposed to moisture and oxygen, it breaks down and corrodes. In order to prevent this from happening, you need a protective barrier. Our VCI (vapor corrosion inhibitor) coated papers, films, VCI bags and emitters provide the anti-corrosion protection you’re looking for.

We want to be your partner in solving your specific industrial rust problems. Get in touch with us and we’ll work hard to provide you with the right solution.

Your Reliable Packaging Partner
Pac Basic is a lot more than a brown box manufacturer.  From a plain brown box to cutting edge packaging solutions - our company was created to support you and your business. By focusing on finding solutions to your protective packaging, we offer a wide range of products to meet your needs. Our commitment to reliability and cost effectiveness ensures that you can lean on us with confidence, knowing that you are getting the best value for your money. Pac Basic can help you discover ways to improve and simplify your current packaging programs.

Pac Basic makes your packaging design, development, production, and procurement simple. 

Just the way it should be. 

Simplifying Packaging
What People Are Saying

“More than a commodity provider, a packaging partner!”

“I’m not sure where else I can go with an order in the morning and have it ship out hours later.”

“Incredible design - you really are packaging insurance.”

Custom & Printed Solutions

Our design team works with you to develop the perfect packaging solution. Whether it’s a plain corrugated container, a custom foam insert, or a returnable reusable tote, we strive to offer you a solution that gets your product to its destination safely. Our state-of-the-art design and manufacturing equipment often makes this “shipping insurance” available with no need for tooling. This results in cost savings and expedited release to our customer. Small volume print - no problem!

Quick Turn Solutions

Producing a custom box in quantities of 1-1000, often with no need to purchase tooling, sets Pac Basic apart. While low volumes are cumbersome for large volume suppliers, we fill a niche for smaller quantities of boxes. Pac Basic serves many industries, from start-ups to Fortune 500, and we would welcome an opportunity to help you with your box and shipping needs.

Sample Solutions

Pac Basic’s ability to produce and test small run samples results in cost savings for our customer. Utilizing our in-house capabilities, our customers can have total confidence in their new package before entering into their ASTM and ISTA certifications. From custom die cuts to shipping crates, put us to the test!

Volume Solutions

As a small business, we are capable of volume with efficiency. With sustainability in mind, our returnable/reusable dunnage exceeds expectations within large corporations. Pac Basic has innovative technology, cutting edge design, and state of the art equipment, enabling us to grow with our customers’ demands.

NORTH AMERICA’S LEADING SPOUTED POUCH MANUFACTURER

Cheer Pack North America (Cheer Pack N.A.) is the leading manufacturer of spouted flexible pouch and cap packaging in North America. Located in a state-of-the-art 305,000 square foot facility in West Bridgewater, Massachusetts, Cheer Pack N.A. is a fully-integrated supplier of ‘Made in USA’ standard and custom injection molded parts, flexible flat and spouted pouches, and strategic partner with leading spouted pouch filling equipment suppliers. 

Cheer Pack N.A. offers premade spouted pouches on rails - or the individual pouch, spout and cap components separately for various filling systems - to provide an innovative, more sustainable and highly-functional package designed to meet the industry’s strictest safety standards. 

CHEER PACK® spouted or flat pouches, recloseable, tamper-evident caps and easy-flow spouts are available in a wide variety of colors, shapes, sizes and materials, which are ideal for liquid and viscous food and non-food product categories including baby food, applesauce, dairy, ice cream, sauces, nut butters, toppings and haircare for hot fill, retort, cold / ambient fill, and high-pressure processing applications. 

Our Cheer Pack Innovation Center™, which includes production-filling loaner equipment, is designed to fast-track new product projects to optimize Brand Owner commercial success.

CONTACT US

New Materials through Thin Film Engineering.

Sigma VaporPhase™ technology is a breakthrough process for depositing functional layers ranging in thickness from a few, to a few hundred, nanometers. Layers can be applied to films, fabrics, paper, and metal foils and can be used to create multi-layer composite materials for the production of high aspect ratio pigments, energy storage devices, and barrier materials.

Learn more about VaporPhase™ Technology

Key Markets and Applications

Thermal Management Materials
Insulating materials, and material composites, designed to control transfer of radiant heat energy. 
learn more...

Fibrous and Porous Materials
Fabrics, paper, and porous films for industrial filtration, air permeable membranes, performance apparel, and packaging.
learn more... 

Barrier Films
Moisture and oxygen barrier films for flexible packaging, electronics, and vacuum insulation panels
learn more...

Performance and Effect Pigments
High aspect ratio vacuum metallized pigments for specialty inks, paints, and coatings.
learn more...

Energy Storage Devices
Sub-micron dielectrics for high energy density, self-healing, high temperature, low ESR, and low dissipation factor film capacitors.
learn more...

Our Work

Sigma works with the world's leading brands to develop and produce innovative products where unique thin film and surface functional effects are required.

Learn more about our work

Sigma has been helping customers develop new products and solve complicated problems where the solutions require innovation in surface chemistry and/or thin films. Learn more about our company and how we might be able to work together.

WINKELMANN FLOWFORMING PART OF HISTORICAL LUNAR MOMENT

On February 22nd, 2024 at 6:24 PM US Eastern Time, the IM-1 lunar lander called Odysseus successfully landed on the moon and is the first American vehicle to do so in 50 years. Additionally, it is the first ever commercial mission to the lunar surface. We at Winkelmann Flowforming congratulate our client Intuitive Machines for this great success and are proud to be part of this historical moment with one of our flowformed components.

THE COMPANY
WINKELMANN FLOWFORMING

We are a proud, professional and innovative member of the Winkelmann Group, a global family-owned company founded back in 1898. We have been involved in chipless forming of metal parts since the 1970s — always pushing the boundaries to shape the technology and the future. A team of 115 experts in flowforming technology, we all share the same passion and conviction — and look forward to working with you on your challenging project.

We create wow!
Pro-quality, eco-friendly Crinkle crafted to secure, cushion, and leave a lasting impression.

Spring-Fill® loose-fill Crinkle Cut™, Very Fine™, and Monster Crinkle™ shreds are manufactured to take an impact and designed to make an impact. Our void fill offers numerous solutions for distributors, retailers, and curators.

WHAT WE MAKE
We are the future of fill.

We have 30 years of best-in-class leadership, partnership support, and service as the leading eco-friendly, loose-fill manufacturer in North America.

It all starts with sustainable paper and the perfect balance of recycled content. In our custom color-capable Ink Kitchen, our paper is infused with ultra-vivid, non-toxic dyes that ensure Spring-Fill® is as environmentally safe as it is pet- and people-safe.

Those are only a few ways sustainable Spring-Fill® makes creating wow easy—and sending some even easier.
